# <a name="chapter-4---description-of-azure-rtos-netx-duo-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-103">第 4 章 - Azure RTOS NetX Duo サービスの説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-103">Chapter 4 - Description of Azure RTOS NetX Duo Services</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-104">この章は、すべての Azure RTOS NetX Duo サービスの説明をアルファベット順にまとめたものです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-104">This chapter contains a description of all Azure RTOS NetX Duo services in alphabetic order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-105">サービス名は、類似するすべてのサービスがグループ化されるように命名されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-105">Service names are designed so all similar services are grouped together.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-106">たとえば、すべての ARP サービスは、この章の最初にあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-106">For example, all ARP services are found at the beginning of this chapter.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-107">NetX Duo には、IPv6 ベースのプロトコルと操作をサポートするために導入された新しいサービスが数多くあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-107">There are numerous new services in NetX Duo introduced to support IPv6-based protocols and operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-108">Net Duo の IPv6 対応サービスには、IPv4 および IPv6 のデュアル スタック操作用に設計されていることを示すプレフィックス ***nxd*** が付いています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-108">IPv6-enabled services in Net Duo have the prefix \***nxd**,\* indicating that they are designed for IPv4 and IPv6 dual stack operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-109">NetX の既存のサービスは、NetX Duo で完全にサポートされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-109">Existing services in NetX are fully supported in NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-110">NetX アプリケーションは、最小限の移植作業で NetX Duo に移行できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-110">NetX applications can be migrated to NetX Duo with minimal porting effort.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-111">*高パフォーマンスの NetX Duo API を最大限に活用できないレガシ アプリケーション コードでは BSD-Compatible SOCKET API を使用できます。BSD-Compatible Socket API の詳細については、付録 D を参照してください*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-111">*Note that a BSD-Compatible Socket API is available for legacy application code that cannot take full advantage of the high-performance NetX Duo API. Refer to Appendix D for more information on the BSD-Compatible Socket API*.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-112">各説明の「戻り値」セクションにある **太字** の値は、API エラー チェックを無効にするために使用される NX_DISABLE_ERROR_CHECKING オプションの影響を受けませんが、太字でない値は完全に無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-112">In the "Return Values" section of each description, values in **BOLD** are not affected by the NX_DISABLE_ERROR_CHECKING option used to disable the API error checking, while values in non-bold are completely disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-113">「許可元」セクションには、各 NetX Duo サービスを呼び出すことのできる呼び出し元が説明されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-113">The "Allowed From" sections indicate from which each NetX Duo service can be called.</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-114">nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-115">ARP キャッシュ内のすべての動的エントリを無効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-115">Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-116">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-116">Prototype</span></span>     

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-117">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-117">Description</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-118">このサービスでは、現在 ARP キャッシュにあるすべての動的 ARP エントリを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-118">This service invalidates all dynamic ARP entries currently in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-119">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-119">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-120">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-120">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-121">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP キャッシュの無効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-122">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP cache invalidate.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-123">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-124">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) 呼び出し元がスレッドではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-125">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-126">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-126">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-127">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-127">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-128">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-128">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-129">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-130">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-130">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Invalidate all dynamic entries in the ARP cache. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entries_invalidate(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the dynamic ARP entries were
   successfully invalidated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-145">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-145">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-146">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-146">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-147">nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-148">動的 ARP エントリを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-148">Set dynamic ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-149">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-149">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);  
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-150">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-150">Description</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-151">このサービスでは、ARP キャッシュから動的エントリを割り当て、指定された IP を物理アドレス マッピングに設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-151">This service allocates a dynamic entry from the ARP cache and sets up the specified IP to physical address mapping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-152">物理アドレスがゼロに指定されている場合は、その物理アドレスが解決されるために、実際の ARP 要求がネットワークに送信されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-152">If a zero physical address is specified, an actual ARP request is sent to the network in order to have the physical address resolved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-153">別の注意すべき点として、ARP エージングがアクティブである場合や、ARP キャッシュが使い果たされていて、これが最も長く使われていない ARP エントリである場合、このエントリは削除されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-153">Also note that this entry will be removed if ARP aging is active or if the ARP cache is exhausted and this is the least recently used ARP entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-154">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-154">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-155">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-155">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-156">**ip_address** マップする IP アドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-156">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-157">**physical_msw** 物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47-32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-157">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-158">**physical_lsw** 物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31-0)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-158">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-159">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-159">Return Values</span></span>    

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP の動的エントリの設定に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-160">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP dynamic entry set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) ARP キャッシュで使用できる ARP エントリがこれ以上ありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-161">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-162">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP インスタンス ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-163">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-164">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-165">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-166">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-166">Allowed From</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-167">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-168">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-168">Preemption Possible</span></span>    
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-169">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-169">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-170">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-170">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a dynamic ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_dynamic_entry_set(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                  0x1022, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a dynamic mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   10:22:00:00:12:34. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-180">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-180">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-181">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-181">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-183">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-183">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-184">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-184">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-187">nx_arp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-187">nx_arp_enable</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-188">アドレス解決プロトコル (ARP) を有効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-188">Enable Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-189">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-189">Prototype</span></span>    

```c
UINT nx_arp_enable(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    VOID *arp_cache_memory,
    ULONG arp_cache_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-190">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-190">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-191">このサービスでは、特定の IP インスタンスの NetX Duo の ARP コンポーネントを初期化します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-191">This service initializes the ARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-192">ARP の初期化には、ARP メッセージの送受信に必要な ARP キャッシュやさまざまな ARP 処理ルーチンの設定が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-192">ARP initialization includes setting up the ARP cache and various ARP processing routines necessary for sending and receiving ARP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-193">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-193">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-194">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-194">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-195">**arp_cache_memory** ARP キャッシュを配置するメモリ領域へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-195">**arp_cache_memory** Pointer to memory area to place ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-196">**arp_cache_size** 各 ARP エントリは 52 バイトであるため、ARP エントリの合計数は 52 で割り切れるサイズになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-196">**arp_cache_size** Each ARP entry is 52 bytes, the total number of ARP entries is, therefore, the size divided by 52.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-197">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-197">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP の有効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-198">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはキャッシュ メモリ ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-199">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) ユーザーが指定した ARP キャッシュ メモリが小さすぎます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-200">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) User supplied ARP cache memory is too small.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-201">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) このコンポーネントは既に有効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-202">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) This component has already been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-203">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-203">Allowed From</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-204">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-204">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-205">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-205">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-206">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-206">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-207">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-207">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ARP and supply 1024 bytes of ARP cache memory for
   previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_enable(&ip_0, (void *) pointer, 1024);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP was successfully enabled for this IP
instance.*/
```

## <a name="nx_arp_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-224">nx_arp_entry_delete</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-225">ARP エントリを削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-225">Delete an ARP entry</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-226">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-226">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG ip_address);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-227">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-227">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-228">このサービスでは、指定された IP アドレスの ARP エントリを、その IP 内部の ARP テーブルから削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-228">This service removes an ARP entry for the given IP address from its IP internal ARP table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-229">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-229">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-230">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-230">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-231">**ip_address** 指定された IP アドレスを持つ ARP エントリは削除される必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-231">**ip_address** ARP entry with the specified IP address should be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-232">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP の有効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-233">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) 指定された IP アドレスを持つエントリが見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-234">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) No entry with the specified IP address can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはキャッシュ メモリ ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-235">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or cache memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-236">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) 指定された IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-237">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Specified IP address is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-238">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-238">Allowed From</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-239">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-239">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-240">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-240">Preemption Possible</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-241">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-241">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-242">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-242">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete the ARP entry with the IP address 1.2.3.4. */
status = nx_arp_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1, 2, 3, 4));

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ARP entry with the specified IP address
   is deleted.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-252">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-252">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-253">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-253">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-254">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-254">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-255">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-255">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-256">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-256">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-257">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-257">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-258">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-258">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_gratuitous_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-259">nx_arp_gratuitous_send</span></span>   
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-260">Gratuitous ARP 要求を送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-260">Send gratuitous ARP request</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-261">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-261">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_gratuitous_send(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    VOID (*response_handler)(NX_IP *ip_ptr, NX_PACKET *packet_ptr));
```                               
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-262">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-263">このサービスでは、インターフェイスの IP アドレスが有効である限り、すべての物理インターフェイスを経由して、Gratuitous ARP 要求を送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-263">This service goes through all the physical interfaces to transmit gratuitous ARP requests as long as the interface IP address is valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-264">その後、ARP 応答を受信した場合は、指定された応答ハンドラーが呼び出されて、Gratuitous ARP への応答を処理します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-264">If an ARP response is subsequently received, the supplied response handler is called to process the response to the gratuitous ARP.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-265">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-266">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-266">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-267">**response_handler** 応答処理関数へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-267">**response_handler** Pointer to response handling function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-268">NX_NULL が指定されている場合、応答は無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-268">If NX_NULL is supplied, responses are ignored.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-269">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Gratuitous ARP の送信に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-270">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gratuitous ARP send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) 使用可能なパケットがありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-271">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No packet available.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-272">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) ARP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) 現在の IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-273">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Current IP address is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-274">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) 呼び出し元がスレッドではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-275">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-276">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-276">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-277">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-277">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-278">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-278">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-279">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-279">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-280">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-280">Example</span></span>

```
/* Send gratuitous ARP without any response handler. */
status = nx_arp_gratuitous_send(&ip_0, NX_NULL);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS the gratuitous ARP was successfully
   sent. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-291">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-291">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-292">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-292">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-293">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-293">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-295">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-295">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-296">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-296">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-297">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-298">IP アドレスに関連付けられている物理ハードウェア アドレスを検索します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-298">Locate physical hardware address given an IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-299">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-299">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-300">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-300">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-301">このサービスでは、指定された IP アドレスに関連付けられている ARP キャッシュ内の物理ハードウェア アドレスの検索を試みます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-301">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied IP address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-302">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-302">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-303">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-303">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-304">**ip_address** 検索する IP アドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-304">**ip_address** IP address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-305">**physical_msw** その物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47-32) を返すための変数へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-305">**physical_msw** Pointer to the variable for returning the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-306">**physical_lsw** その物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31-0) を返すための変数へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-306">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the variable for returning the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-307">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-307">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP ハードウェア アドレスの検索に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-308">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP hardware address find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) マッピングが ARP キャッシュに見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-309">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-310">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはメモリ ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-311">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-312">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-313">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-314">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-315">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-316">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-316">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-317">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-317">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-318">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-318">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the hardware address associated with the IP address of
   1.2.3.4 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                      &physical_msw,
                                      &physical_lsw);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables physical_msw and
   physical_lsw contain the hardware address.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-328">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-328">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-329">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-329">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-330">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-330">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-331">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-331">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-332">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-332">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-333">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-334">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-335">nx_arp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-335">nx_arp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-336">ARP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-336">Retrieve information about ARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-337">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-337">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *arp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *arp_requests_received,
    ULONG *arp_responses_sent,
    ULONG *arp_responses_received,
    ULONG *arp_dynamic_entries,
    ULONG *arp_static_entries,
    ULONG *arp_aged_entries,
    ULONG *arp_invalid_messages);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-338">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-338">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-339">このサービスでは、関連付けられている IP インスタンスの ARP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-339">This service retrieves information about ARP activities for the associated IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-340">*宛先ポインターが NX_NULL の場合、その特定の情報は呼び出し元に返されません*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-340">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-341">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-342">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-342">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-343">**arp_requests_sent** この IP インスタンスから送信された ARP 要求の合計の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-343">**arp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-344">**arp_requests_received** ネットワークから受信した ARP 要求の合計の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-344">**arp_requests_received** Pointer to destination for the total ARP requests received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-345">**arp_responses_sent** この IP インスタンスから送信された ARP 応答の合計の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-345">**arp_responses_sent** Pointer to destination for the total ARP responses sent from this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-346">**arp_responses_received** ネットワークから受信した ARP 応答の合計の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-346">**arp_responses_received** Pointer to the destination for the total ARP responses received from the network.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** 現在の動的 ARP エントリ数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-347">**arp_dynamic_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of dynamic ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-348">**arp_static_entries** 現在の静的 ARP エントリ数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-348">**arp_static_entries** Pointer to the destination for the current number of static ARP entries.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-349">**arp_aged_entries** 期限切れで無効になった ARP エントリの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-349">**arp_aged_entries** Pointer to the destination of the total number of ARP entries that have aged and became invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-350">**arp_invalid_messages** 受信した無効な ARP メッセージの合計の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-350">**arp_invalid_messages** Pointer to the destination of the total invalid ARP messages received.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-351">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-351">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP 情報の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-352">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-356">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-357">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-357">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-358">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-359">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-360">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Pickup ARP information for ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_info_get(&ip_0, &arp_requests_sent,
                         &arp_requests_received,
                         &arp_responses_sent,
                         &arp_responses_received,
                         &arp_dynamic_entries,
                         &arp_static_entries,
                         &arp_aged_entries,
                         &arp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the ARP information has been stored in
   the supplied variables. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-367">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-367">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-370">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-370">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-371">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-371">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-372">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-372">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-373">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-373">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-374">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-374">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-375">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-375">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-376">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-376">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-377">nx_arp_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-378">物理アドレスに関連付けられている IP アドレスを検索します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-378">Locate IP address given a physical address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-379">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-379">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    ULONG *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw, 
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-380">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-380">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-381">このサービスでは、指定された物理アドレスに関連付けられている ARP キャッシュ内の IP アドレスの検索を試みます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-381">This service attempts to find an IP address in the ARP cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-382">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-382">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-383">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-383">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-384">**ip_address** マップされた IP アドレスが見つかった場合は、それを返すためのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-384">**ip_address** Pointer to return IP address, if one is found that has been mapped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-385">**physical_msw** 検索対象の物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47-32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-385">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-386">**physical_lsw** 検索対象の物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31-0)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-386">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to search for.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-387">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-387">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ARP IP アドレスの検索に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP IP address find</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) マッピングが ARP キャッシュに見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-389">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはメモリ ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-390">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) physical_msw と physical_lsw がどちらも 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-393">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-394">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-394">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-395">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-395">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-396">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-396">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-397">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-397">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-398">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-398">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Search for the IP address associated with the hardware address of
   0x0:0x01234 in the ARP cache of the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address, 0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the variables ip_address contains the
   associated IP address. */
```

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entries_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-415">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-416">すべての静的 ARP エントリを削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-416">Delete all static ARP entries</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-417">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-417">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entries_delete(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-418">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-418">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-419">このサービスでは、ARP キャッシュ内のすべての静的エントリを削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-419">This service deletes all static entries in the ARP cache.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-420">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-420">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-421">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-421">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-422">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 静的エントリが削除されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-423">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Static entries are deleted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ip_ptr ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid ip_ptr pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-425">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-426">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-427">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-428">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-428">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-429">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-429">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-430">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-431">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-431">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete all the static ARP entries for IP Instance 0, assuming
   "ip_0" is the NX_IP structure for IP Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entries_delete(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS all static ARP entries in the ARP cache
   have been deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-446">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-446">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-448">nx_arp_static_entry_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-449">ARP キャッシュにハードウェア マッピングへの静的 IP を作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-449">Create static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-450">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-450">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-451">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-451">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-452">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの ARP キャッシュに静的 IP から物理アドレスへのマッピングを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-452">This service creates a static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-453">静的 ARP エントリは、ARP の定期的な更新の対象にはなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-453">Static ARP entries are not subject to ARP periodic updates.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-454">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-455">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-455">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-456">**ip_address** マップする IP アドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-456">**ip_address** IP address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-457">**physical_msw** マップする物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47-32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-457">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to map.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-458">**physical_lsw** マップする物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31-0)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-458">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to map.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-459">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-459">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 静的 ARP エントリの作成に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-460">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) ARP キャッシュで使用できる ARP エントリがこれ以上ありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-461">**NX_NO_MORE_ENTRIES** (0x17) No more ARP entries are available in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-462">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-463">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-464">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-465">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) physical_msw と physical_lsw がどちらも 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-466">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-467">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-467">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-468">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-468">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-469">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-469">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-470">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-470">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-471">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-471">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_create(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, there is now a static mapping between
   the IP address of 1.2.3.4 and the physical hardware address of
   0x00:0x1234. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-478">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-478">nx_arp_hardware_address_find</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-481">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-481">nx_arp_static_entries_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-482">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-482">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-483">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-483">nxd_nd_cache_entry_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-484">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-484">nxd_nd_cache_entry_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-485">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-485">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-486">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-486">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-487">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-487">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>

## <a name="nx_arp_static_entry_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-488">nx_arp_static_entry_delete</span></span> 
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-489">ARP キャッシュにある、静的 IP からハードウェアへのマッピングを削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-489">Delete static IP to hardware mapping in ARP cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-490">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-490">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_arp_static_entry_delete(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-491">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-492">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの ARP キャッシュの中で、静的 IP から物理アドレスへ結び付ける、以前に作成されたマッピングを検索して削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-492">This service finds and deletes a previously created static IP-to-physical address mapping in the ARP cache for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-493">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-494">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-494">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-495">**ip_address** 静的にマップされた IP アドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-495">**ip_address** IP address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-496">**physical_msw** 静的にマップされた物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47 - \*\*32)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-496">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47 - \*\*32) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-497">**physical_lsw** 静的にマップされた物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31 - \*\*0)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-497">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31 - \*\*0) of the physical address that was mapped statically.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-498">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-498">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 静的 ARP エントリの削除に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-499">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ARP static entry delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) 静的 ARP エントリが ARP キャッシュに見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-500">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Static ARP entry was not found in the ARP cache.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-501">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-502">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-503">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-504">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) physical_msw と physical_lsw がどちらも 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-505">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) Physical_msw and physical_lsw are both 0.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-506">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-506">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-507">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-507">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-508">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-508">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-509">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-509">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-510">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-510">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a static ARP entry on the previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_arp_static_entry_delete(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,4),
                                    0x0, 0x1234);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created static ARP entry
   was successfully deleted. */
```

## <a name="nx_icmp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-527">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-527">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-528">インターネット制御メッセージ プロトコル (ICMP) を有効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-528">Enable Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-529">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-529">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-530">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-530">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-531">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの ICMP コンポーネントを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-531">This service enables the ICMP component for the specified IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-532">この ICMP コンポーネントは、インターネット エラー メッセージと ping の要求および応答を処理する役割を果たします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-532">The ICMP component is responsible for handling Internet error messages and ping requests and replies.</span></span> 

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-533">*このサービスでは、IPv4 サービス用の ICMP のみが有効になります。ICMPv4 と ICMPv6 の両方を有効にするには、アプリケーションで **nxd_icmp_enable** サービスを使用する必要があります*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-533">*This service only enables ICMP for IPv4 service. To enable both ICMPv4 and ICMPv6, applications shall use the **nxd_icmp_enable** service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-534">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-534">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-535">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-535">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-536">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-536">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP の有効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-537">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP は既に有効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-538">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) ICMP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-539">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-540">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-541">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-541">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-542">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-542">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-543">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-543">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-544">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-544">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-545">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-545">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable ICMP on the previously created IP Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP is enabled. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-546">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-546">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-548">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-548">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-550">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-550">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-551">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-551">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-552">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-552">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-553">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-554">ICMP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-554">Retrieve information about ICMP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-555">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-555">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *pings_sent,
    ULONG *ping_timeouts,
    ULONG *ping_threads_suspended,
    ULONG *ping_responses_received,
    ULONG *icmp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *icmp_unhandled_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-556">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-556">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-557">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの ICMP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-557">This service retrieves information about ICMP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-558">*宛先ポインターが NX_NULL の場合、その特定の情報は呼び出し元に返されません*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-558">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-559">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-559">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-560">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-560">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-561">**pings_sent** 送信された ping の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-561">**pings_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of pings sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-562">**ping_timeouts** ping タイムアウトの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-562">**ping_timeouts** Pointer to destination for the total number of ping timeouts.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-563">**ping_threads_suspended** ping 要求で中断されているスレッドの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-563">**ping_threads_suspended** Pointer to destination of the total number of threads suspended on ping requests.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-564">**ping_responses_received** 受信した ping 応答の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-564">**ping_responses_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of ping responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** ICMP チェックサム エラーの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-565">**icmp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of ICMP checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** 処理されていない ICMP メッセージの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-566">**icmp_unhandled_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of un-handled ICMP messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-567">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-567">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ICMP 情報の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-568">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ICMP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-569">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-570">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-571">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-572">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-573">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-573">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-574">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-574">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-575">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-575">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-576">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-576">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve ICMP information from previously created IP
   instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_info_get(&ip_0, &pings_sent, &ping_timeouts,
                          &ping_threads_suspended,
                          &ping_responses_received,
                          &icmp_checksum_errors,
                          &icmp_unhandled_messages);
/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, ICMP information was retrieved. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-577">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-577">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-578">nx_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-578">nx_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-579">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-579">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-580">nxd_icmp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-581">nxd_icmp_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-582">nxd_icmp_source_ping</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-583">nxd_icmpv6_ra_flag_callback_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_icmp_ping"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-584">nx_icmp_ping</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-584">nx_icmp_ping</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-585">指定された IP アドレスに ping 要求を送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-585">Send ping request to specified IP address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-586">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-586">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_icmp_ping(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG ip_address,
    CHAR *data, ULONG data_size,
    NX_PACKET **response_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-587">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-588">このサービスでは、指定された IP アドレスに ping 要求を送信し、ping 応答メッセージを指定された時間だけ待機します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-588">This service sends a ping request to the specified IP address and waits for the specified amount of time for a ping response message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-589">応答が受信されない場合は、エラーが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-589">If no response is received, an error is returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-590">それ以外の場合は、response_ptr によってポイントされている変数で応答メッセージ全体が返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-590">Otherwise, the entire response message is returned in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-591">IPv6 宛先に ping 要求を送信するには、アプリケーションで ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ または _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** サービスを使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-591">To send a ping request to an IPv6 destination, applications shall use the ***nxd_icmp_ping** _ or _ *_nxd_icmp_source_ping_** service.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-592">*NX_SUCCESS が返された場合、不要になった受信パケットを解放する責任はアプリケーションにあります*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-592">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet after it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-593">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-594">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-594">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-595">**ip_address** ping する IP アドレス (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-595">**ip_address** IP address, in host byte order, to ping.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-596">**data** ping メッセージのデータ領域へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-596">**data** Pointer to data area for ping message.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-597">**data_size** ping データ内のバイト数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-597">**data_size** Number of bytes in the ping data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-598">**response_ptr** ping 応答メッセージを返すパケット ポインターへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-598">**response_ptr** Pointer to packet pointer to return the ping response message in.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-599">**wait_option** ping 応答を待機する ThreadX のタイマー ティック数を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-599">**wait_option** Defines the number of ThreadX timer ticks to wait for a ping response.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-600">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-600">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="a7950-601">待機オプション</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-601">Wait Option</span></span>            | <span data-ttu-id="a7950-602">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-602">Value</span></span>                           |
| -----------------------|---------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="a7950-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-603">NX_NO_WAIT</span></span>             | <span data-ttu-id="a7950-604">(0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-604">(0x00000000)</span></span>                    |
| <span data-ttu-id="a7950-605">タイムアウト値 (ティック数)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-605">timeout value in ticks</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="a7950-606">(0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-606">(0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="a7950-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-607">NX_WAIT_FOREVER</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="a7950-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-608">0xFFFFFFFF</span></span>                      |

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-609">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-609">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ping に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-610">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful ping.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-611">応答メッセージ ポインターは、response_ptr によってポイントされている変数に配置されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-611">Response message pointer was placed in the variable pointed to by response_ptr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) ping 要求パケットを割り当てることができません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-612">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) Unable to allocate a ping request packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) 指定されたデータ領域が、この IP インスタンスの既定のパケット サイズを超えています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-613">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Specified data area exceeds the default packet size for this IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) 要求された IP が応答しませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-614">**NX_NO_RESPONSE** (0x29) Requested IP did not respond.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-615">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-616">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP または応答ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-617">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or response pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-618">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-619">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-620">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-620">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-621">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-621">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-622">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-622">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-623">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-623">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-624">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-624">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Issue a ping to IP address 1.2.3.5 from the previously created IP
   Instance ip_0. */
status = nx_icmp_ping(&ip_0, IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5), "abcd", 4,
                      &response_ptr, 10);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, a ping response was received from IP
   address 1.2.3.5 and the response packet is contained in the
   packet pointed to by response_ptr. It should have the same "abcd"
   four bytes of data. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-627">nx_icmp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-627">nx_icmp_info_get</span></span>
