- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2728">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2728">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2729">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2729">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2730">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2730">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2731">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2731">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2732">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2732">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2733">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2733">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2734">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2734">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2735">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2735">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_length_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2736">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2737">パケット データの長さを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2737">Get length of packet data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2738">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2738">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_length_get(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr, 
    ULONG *length);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2739">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2739">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2740">このサービスでは、指定されたパケット内のデータの長さを取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2740">This service gets the length of the data in the specified packet.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2741">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2741">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2742">**packet_ptr** パケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2742">**packet_ptr** Pointer to the packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2743">**length** パケットの長さの宛先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2743">**length** Destination for the packet length.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2744">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2744">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) パケットの長さの取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2745">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet length get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) パケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2746">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2747">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2747">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2748">初期化、スレッド、タイマー、ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2748">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2749">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2749">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2750">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2750">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2751">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2751">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the length of the data in "my_packet." */
status = nx_packet_length_get(my_packet, &my_length);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, data length is in "my_length". */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2758">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2758">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2765">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2766">指定されたメモリ領域にパケット プールを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2766">Create packet pool in specified memory area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2767">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2767">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_create(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    CHAR *name,
    ULONG payload_size,
    VOID *memory_ptr,
    ULONG memory_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2768">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2768">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2769">このサービスでは、ユーザーが指定したメモリ領域に、指定されたパケット サイズのパケット プールを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2769">This service creates a packet pool of the specified packet size in the memory area supplied by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2770">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2771">**pool_ptr** パケット プール制御ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2771">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2772">**name** パケット プールのアプリケーションの名前へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2772">**name** Pointer to application’s name for the packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2773">**payload_size** プール内の各パケットのバイト数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2773">**payload_size** Number of bytes in each packet in the pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2774">この値は、40 バイト以上である必要があり、4 で割り切れなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2774">This value must be at least 40 bytes and must also be evenly divisible by 4.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2775">**memory_ptr** パケット プールを配置するメモリ領域へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2775">**memory_ptr** Pointer to the memory area to place the packet pool in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2776">このポインターは、ULONG 境界上に配置する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2776">The pointer should be aligned on an ULONG boundary.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2777">**memory_size** プールのメモリ領域のサイズ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2777">**memory_size** Size of the pool memory area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2778">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2778">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) パケット プールの作成に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2779">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) プールまたはメモリ ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2780">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool or memory pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) ブロックまたはメモリのサイズが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2781">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Invalid block or memory size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2782">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2783">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2783">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2784">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2784">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2785">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2785">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2786">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2786">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2787">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2787">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a packet pool of 32000 bytes starting at physical
   address 0x10000000. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, "Default Pool", 128,
                               (void *) 0x10000000, 32000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   created. */
```

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2801">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2802">以前に作成されたパケット プールを削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2802">Delete previously created packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2803">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2803">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT  nx_packet_pool_delete(NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2804">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2804">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2805">このサービスでは、以前に作成されたパケット プールを削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2805">This service deletes a previously created packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2806">NetX Duo により、そのパケット プール内のパケットで現在中断状態にあるスレッドがないかが確認され、中断がクリアされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2806">NetX Duo checks for any threads currently suspended on packets in the packet pool and clears the suspension.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2807">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2808">**pool_ptr** パケット プール制御ブロック ポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2808">**pool_ptr** Packet pool control block pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2809">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2809">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) パケット プールの削除に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2810">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) プール ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2811">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2812">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2813">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2813">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2814">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2814">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2815">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2815">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2816">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2817">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2817">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created packet pool. */
status = nx_packet_pool_delete(&pool_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet pool has been successfully
   deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2823">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2823">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2824">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2824">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2825">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2825">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2828">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2828">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2831">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2832">パケット プールに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2832">Retrieve information about a packet pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2833">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2833">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_info_get(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG *total_packets,
    ULONG *free_packets,
    ULONG *empty_pool_requests,
    ULONG *empty_pool_suspensions,
    ULONG *invalid_packet_releases);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2834">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2834">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2835">このサービスでは、指定されたパケット プールに関する情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2835">This service retrieves information about the specified packet pool.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2836">*宛先ポインターが NX_NULL の場合、その特定の情報は呼び出し元に返されません*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2836">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2837">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2838">**pool_ptr** 以前に作成されたパケット プールへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2838">**pool_ptr** Pointer to previously created packet pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2839">**total_packets** プール内のパケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2839">**total_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of packets in the pool.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2840">**free_packets** 現在解放されているパケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2840">**free_packets** Pointer to destination for the total number of currently free packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2841">**empty_pool_requests** プールが空だった場合の割り当て要求の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2841">**empty_pool_requests** Pointer to destination of the total number of allocation requests when the pool was empty.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** 空のプールによる中断の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2842">**empty_pool_suspensions** Pointer to destination of the total number of empty pool suspensions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** 無効なパケット解放の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2843">**invalid_packet_releases** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid packet releases.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2844">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2844">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) パケット プール情報の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2845">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet pool information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2846">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2847">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2848">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2849">初期化、スレッド、タイマー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2849">Initialization, threads, and timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2850">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2850">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2851">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2851">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2852">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2852">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve packet pool information. */
status = nx_packet_pool_info_get(&pool_0,
                                 &total_packets,
                                 &free_packets,
                                 &empty_pool_requests,
                                 &empty_pool_suspensions,
                                 &invalid_packet_releases);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, packet pool information was
   retrieved. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2853">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2853">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2857">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2857">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2858">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2858">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2859">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2859">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2860">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2860">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2861">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2861">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2862">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2862">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2863">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2863">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2864">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2864">nx_packet_release</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2865">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2865">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2866">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2867">パケット プールの低レベルのウォーターマークを設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2867">Set packet pool low watermark</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2868">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2868">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set(
    NX_PACKET_POOL *pool_ptr,
    ULONG low_watermark);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2869">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2869">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2870">このサービスでは、指定されたパケット プールの低レベルのウォーターマークを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2870">This service configures the low watermark for the specified packet pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2871">低レベルのウォーターマーク値を設定すると、TCP または UDP は、パケット プール内の使用可能なパケット数がそのパケット プールの低レベル ウォーターマーク未満の場合、受信したパケットをキューで待機しません。これにより、パケット プールのパケットが不足するのを防ぐことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2871">Once the low watermark value is set, TCP or UDP will not queue up the received packets if the number of available packets in the packet pool is less than the packet pool's low watermark, preventing the packet pool from being starved of packets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2872">このサービスは、オプション ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** を定義して NetX Duo ライブラリが構築されている場合に使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2872">This service is available if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_LOW_WATERMARK*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2873">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2873">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2874">**pool_ptr** パケット プール制御ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2874">**pool_ptr** Pointer to packet pool control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2875">**low_watermark** 構成する低レベルのウォーターマーク値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2875">**low_watermark** Low watermark value to be configured</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2876">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2876">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 低レベルのウォーターマーク値が正常に設定されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2877">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the low watermark value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) 低レベルのウォーターマーク機能は NetX Duo に組み込まれていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2878">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The low watermark feature is not built into NetX Duo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) プール ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2879">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pool pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2880">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2881">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2882">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2882">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2883">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2883">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2884">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2884">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2885">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2885">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set pool_0 low watermark value to 2. */
status = nx_packet_pool_create(&pool_0, 2);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the low watermark value is set for
   pool_0.*/
```

## <a name="nx_packet_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2899">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2899">nx_packet_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2900">以前に割り当てられたパケットを解放します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2900">Release previously allocated packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2901">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2901">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2902">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2903">このサービスでは、パケットを解放します。これには、指定されたパケットにチェーンされている追加のパケットも含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2903">This service releases a packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2904">パケット割り当てで別のスレッドがブロックされている場合は、それにこのパケットが与えられて、それが再開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2904">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2905">*パケットが複数回解放されると予期しない結果が発生するため、アプリケーションでそれが生じないようにする必要があります*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2905">*The application must prevent releasing a packet more than once, because doing so will cause unpredictable results*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2906">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2906">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2907">**packet_ptr** パケット ポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2907">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2908">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2908">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) パケットの解放に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2909">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) パケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2910">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) 先頭追加ポインターがペイロードの先頭未満です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2911">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) 追加ポインターがペイロードの末尾を超えています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2912">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2913">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2914">初期化、スレッド、タイマー、ISR (アプリケーション ネットワーク ドライバー)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2914">Initialization, threads, timers, and ISRs (application network drivers)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2915">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2915">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2916">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2917">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2917">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet. */
status = nx_packet_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been returned to the
   packet pool it was allocated from. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2918">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2918">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2919">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2919">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2921">nx_packet_copy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2921">nx_packet_copy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2922">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2922">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2923">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2923">nx_packet_data_extract_offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2924">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2924">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2925">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2925">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2926">nx_packet_pool_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2926">nx_packet_pool_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2927">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2927">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2928">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2928">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2929">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2929">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2930">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_packet_transmit_release"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2931">nx_packet_transmit_release</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2932">送信済みパケットを解放します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2932">Release a transmitted packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2933">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2933">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_packet_transmit_release(NX_PACKET *packet_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2934">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2934">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2935">TCP 以外のパケットの場合、このサービスによって送信済みパケットが解放されます。これには、指定されたパケットにチェーンされている追加のパケットも含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2935">For non-TCP packets, this service releases a transmitted packet, including any additional packets chained to the specified packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2936">パケット割り当てで別のスレッドがブロックされている場合は、それにこのパケットが与えられて、それが再開されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2936">If another thread is blocked on packet allocation, it is given the packet and resumed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2937">送信済みの TCP パケットの場合、パケットは送信中としてマークされますが、パケットの受信が確認されるまでは解放されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2937">For a transmitted TCP packet, the packet is marked as being transmitted but not released till the packet is acknowledged.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2938">通常、このサービスは、パケットが送信された後にアプリケーションのネットワーク ドライバーから呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2938">This service is typically called from the application's network driver after a packet is transmitted.</span></span>

> [!WARNING] 
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2939">*ネットワーク ドライバーでは、このサービスを呼び出す前に、物理メディア ヘッダーを削除し、パケットの長さを調整する必要があります*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2939">*The network driver should remove the physical media header and adjust the length of the packet before calling this service*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2940">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2941">**packet_ptr** パケット ポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2941">**packet_ptr** Packet pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2942">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2942">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 送信パケットの解放に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2943">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit packet release.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) パケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2944">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) 先頭追加ポインターがペイロードの先頭未満です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2945">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Prepend pointer is less than payload start.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) 追加ポインターがペイロードの末尾を超えています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2946">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Append pointer is greater than payload end.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2947">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2947">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2948">初期化、スレッド、タイマー、アプリケーション ネットワーク ドライバー (ISR を含む)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2948">Initialization, threads, timers, Application network drivers (including ISRs)</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2949">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2949">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2950">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2950">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2951">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2951">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Release a previously allocated packet that was just transmitted
   from the application network driver. */
status = nx_packet_transmit_release(packet_ptr);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the transmitted packet has been
   returned to the packet pool it was allocated from. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2952">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2952">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2953">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2953">nx_ip_auxiliary_packet_pool_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2956">nx_packet_data_append</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2956">nx_packet_data_append</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2958">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2958">nx_packet_data_retrieve</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2959">nx_packet_length_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2959">nx_packet_length_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2961">nx_packet_pool_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2961">nx_packet_pool_delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2962">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2962">nx_packet_pool_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2963">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2963">nx_packet_pool_low_watermark_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2964">nx_packet_release</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2964">nx_packet_release</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2965">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2966">逆アドレス解決プロトコル (RARP) を無効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2966">Disable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2967">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2967">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_disable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2968">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2968">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2969">このサービスを使用すると、特定の IP インスタンスの NetX Duo の RARP コンポーネントが無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2969">This service disables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2970">マルチホーム システムの場合、このサービスを使用するとすべてのインターフェイスで RARP が無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2970">For a multihome  system, this service disables RARP on all interfaces.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2971">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2971">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2972">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2972">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2973">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2973">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RARP の無効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2974">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP が有効になっていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2975">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) RARP was not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2976">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2977">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2978">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2978">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2979">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2979">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2980">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2980">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2981">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2981">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2982">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2982">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Disable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_disable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is disabled. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2983">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2983">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2984">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2984">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2985">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2985">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2986">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2987">逆アドレス解決プロトコル (RARP) を有効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2987">Enable Reverse Address Resolution Protocol (RARP)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2988">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2988">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2989">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2989">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-2990">このサービスを使用すると、特定の IP インスタンスの NetX Duo の RARP コンポーネントが有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2990">This service enables the RARP component of NetX Duo for the specific IP instance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2991">RARP コンポーネントでは、接続されているすべてのネットワーク インターフェイスから IP アドレスがゼロであるものを検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2991">The RARP components searches through all attached network interfaces for zero IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2992">IP アドレスがゼロであることは、そのインターフェイスに IP アドレスがまだ割り当てられていないことを示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2992">A zero IP address indicates the interface does not have IP address assignment yet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2993">RARP では、そのインターフェイスで RARP プロセスを有効にすることにより、IP アドレスの解決が試みられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2993">RARP attempts to resolve the IP address by enabling RARP process on that interface.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2994">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2994">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2995">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2995">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-2996">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RARP の有効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2997">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP アドレスは既に有効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2998">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) IP address is already valid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP は既に有効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-2999">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) RARP was already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3000">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3001">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3002">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3003">初期化、スレッド、タイマー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3003">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3004">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3004">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3005">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3005">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3006">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3006">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable RARP on the previously created IP instance. */
status = nx_rarp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP is enabled and is attempting to
   resolve this IP instance’s address by querying the network. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3007">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3007">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3008">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3008">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3009">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3009">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_rarp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3010">nx_rarp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3011">RARP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3011">Retrieve information about RARP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3012">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3012">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_rarp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *rarp_requests_sent,
    ULONG *rarp_responses_received,
    ULONG *rarp_invalid_messages);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3013">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3013">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3014">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの RARP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3014">This service retrieves information about RARP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3015">*宛先ポインターが NX_NULL の場合、その特定の情報は呼び出し元に返されません*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3015">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3016">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3017">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3017">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** 送信された RARP 要求の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3018">**rarp_requests_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP requests sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3019">**rarp_responses_received** 受信した RARP 応答の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3019">**rarp_responses_received** Pointer to destination for the total number of RARP responses received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** 無効なメッセージの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3020">**rarp_invalid_messages** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid messages.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3021">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) RARP 情報の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3022">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful RARP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3023">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3024">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3025">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3026">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3027">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3027">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3028">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3028">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3029">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3029">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3030">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3030">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve RARP information from previously created IP
   Instance 0. */
status = nx_rarp_info_get(&ip_0,
                          &rarp_requests_sent,
                          &rarp_responses_received,
                          &rarp_invalid_messages);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, RARP information was retrieved. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3031">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3031">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3032">nx_rarp_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3032">nx_rarp_disable</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3033">nx_rarp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3033">nx_rarp_enable</span></span>

## <a name="nx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3034">nx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3034">nx_system_initialize</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3035">NetX Duo システムを初期化します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3035">Initialize NetX Duo System</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3036">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3036">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
VOID nx_system_initialize(VOID);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3037">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3038">このサービスを使用すると、NetX Duo の基本的なシステム リソースが使用に備えて初期化されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3038">This service initializes the basic NetX Duo system resources in preparation for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3039">これはアプリケーションにより、初期化中、他のどの NetX Duo 呼び出しが実行されるよりも前に呼び出されなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3039">It should be called by the application during initialization and before any other NetX Duo call are made.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3040">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3040">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3041">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3041">None</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3042">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3042">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3043">なし</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3043">None</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3044">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3044">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3045">初期化、スレッド、タイマー、ISR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3045">Initialization, threads, timers, ISRs</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3046">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3046">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3047">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3047">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3048">システム管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3048">System Management</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3049">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3049">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initialize NetX Duo for operation. */
nx_system_initialize();

/* At this point, NetX Duo is ready for IP creation and all
   subsequent network operations. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3074">nx_tcp_client_socket_bind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3075">TCP ポートにクライアントの TCP ソケットをバインドします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3075">Bind client TCP socket to TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3076">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3076">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3077">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3077">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3078">このサービスでは、以前に作成された TCP クライアント ソケットを、指定された TCP ポートにバインドします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3078">This service binds the previously created TCP client socket to the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3079">有効な TCP ソケットの範囲は 0 から 0xFFFF です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3079">Valid TCP sockets range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3080">指定された TCP ポートが使用できない場合は、サービスは指定された待機オプションに従って中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3080">If the specified TCP port is unavailable, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3081">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3082">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3082">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3083">**port** バインドするポート番号 (1 から 0xFFFF)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3083">**port Port** number to bind (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3084">ポート番号が NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000) の場合、IP インスタンスによって次の空きポートが検索されて、バインドに使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3084">If port number is NX_ANY_PORT (0x0000), the IP instance will search for the next free port and use that for the binding.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3085">**wait_option** ポートが既に別のソケットにバインドされている場合のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3085">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the port is already bound to another socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3086">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3086">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3087">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3088">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3089">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3089">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3090">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3090">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットのバインドに成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3091">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) このソケットは既に別の TCP ポートにバインドされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3092">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) This socket is already bound to another TCP port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) ポートは既に別のソケットにバインドされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3093">**NX_PORT_UNAVAILABLE** (0x23) Port is already bound to a different socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) 空きポートがありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3094">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3095">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) ポートが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3096">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3097">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3098">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3099">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3100">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3100">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3101">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3101">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3102">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3102">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3103">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3103">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3104">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3104">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Bind a previously created client socket to port 12 and wait for 7
   timer ticks for the bind to complete. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_bind(&client_socket, 12, 7);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created client_socket is
   bound to port 12 on the associated IP instance. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3128">nx_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3129">クライアントの TCP ソケットを接続します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3129">Connect client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3130">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3130">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3131">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3131">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3132">このサービスでは、以前に作成され、バインドされた TCP クライアント ソケットを、指定されたサーバーのポートに接続します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3132">This service connects the previously created and bound TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3133">有効な TCP サーバー ポートの範囲は 0 から 0xFFFF です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3133">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3134">接続がすぐに完了しない場合、サービスは指定された待機オプションに従って中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3134">If the connection does not complete immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3135">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3136">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3136">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3137">**server_ip** サーバーの IP アドレス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3137">**server_ip** Server’s IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3138">**server_port** 接続先のサーバー ポート番号\*\* (1 から 0xFFFF)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3138">**server_port** Server port number to connect to\*\* (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3139">**wait_option** 接続を確立している最中のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3139">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3140">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3140">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3141">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3142">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3143">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3143">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3144">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3144">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットの接続に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3145">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) ソケットがバインドされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3146">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) ソケットが CLOSED 状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3147">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) 待機が指定されていないため、接続の試行を実行中です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3148">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) 指定されたインターフェイスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3149">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface supplied.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3150">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) サーバー IP アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3151">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) ポートが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3152">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3153">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3154">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3155">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3156">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3157">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3157">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3158">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3158">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3159">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3159">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3160">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3160">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Initiate a TCP connection from a previously created and bound
   client socket. The connection requested in this example is to
   port 12 on the server with the IP address of 1.2.3.5. This
   service will wait 300 timer ticks for the connection to take
   place before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_connect(&client_socket,
                                      IP_ADDRESS(1,2,3,5),
                                      12, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously created and bound
   client_socket is connected to port 12 on IP 1.2.3.5. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3184">nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3185">クライアントの TCP ソケットにバインドされているポート番号を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3185">Get port number bound to client TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3186">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3186">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT *port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3187">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3187">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3188">このサービスでは、ソケットに関連付けられているポート番号を取得します。これは、ソケットのバインド時に NX_ANY_PORT が指定された場合に NetX Duo によって割り当てられたポートを見つけるのに便利です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3188">This service retrieves the port number associated with the socket, which is useful to find the port allocated by NetX Duo in situations where the NX_ANY_PORT was specified at the time the socket was bound.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3189">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3189">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3190">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3190">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3191">**port_ptr** 戻りポート番号の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3191">**port_ptr** Pointer to destination for the return port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3192">有効なポート番号は、1 から 0xFFFF です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3192">Valid port numbers are (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3193">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3193">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットのバインドに成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3194">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket bind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) このソケットはポートにバインドされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3195">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) This socket is not bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターまたはポートの戻りポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3196">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer or port return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3197">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3198">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3199">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3200">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3200">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3201">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3201">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3202">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3202">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3203">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3203">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the port number of previously created and bound client
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_port_get(&client_socket, &port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the port variable contains the port this
   socket is bound to. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3215">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3215">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3227">nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3228">TCP クライアント ソケットを TCP ポートからバインド解除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3228">Unbind TCP client socket from TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3229">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3229">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3230">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3231">このサービスでは、TCP クライアント ソケットと TCP ポートとの間のバインドを解放します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3231">This service releases the binding between the TCP client socket and a TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3232">同じポート番号に別のソケットをバインドするために待機している他のスレッドがある場合は、中断されている最初のスレッドがこのポートにバインドされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3232">If there are other threads waiting to bind another socket to the same port number, the first suspended thread is then bound to this port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3233">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3233">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3234">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3234">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3235">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3235">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットのバインド解除に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3236">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket unbind.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) ソケットがどのポートにもバインドされていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3237">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) ソケットが切断されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3238">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket has not been disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3239">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3240">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3241">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3242">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3243">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3243">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3244">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3244">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3245">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3246">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3246">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Unbind a previously created and bound client TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_client_socket_unbind(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is no longer
   bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3270">nx_tcp_enable</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3271">NetX Duo の TCP コンポーネントを有効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3271">Enable TCP component of NetX Duo</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3272">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3272">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_enable(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3273">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3273">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3274">このサービスでは、NetX Duo の伝送制御プロトコル (TCP) コンポーネントを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3274">This service enables the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) component of NetX Duo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3275">有効にすると、アプリケーションで TCP 接続を確立できるようになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3275">After enabled, TCP connections may be established by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3276">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3276">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3277">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3277">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3278">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3278">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP の有効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3279">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP は既に有効になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3280">**NX_ALREADY_ENABLED** (0x15) TCP is already enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3283">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3284">初期化、スレッド、タイマー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3284">Initialization, threads, timers</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3285">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3285">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3286">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3286">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3287">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3287">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Enable TCP on a previously created IP instance ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_enable(&ip_0);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP is enabled on the IP instance. */
```
