## <a name="nx_tcp_free_port_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3311">nx_tcp_free_port_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3312">使用可能な次の TCP ポートを検索します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3312">Find next available TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3313">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3313">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_free_port_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    UINT port,
    UINT *free_port_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3314">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3315">このサービスでは、アプリケーションで指定されているポートを起点として、空いている TCP ポート (バインドされていないもの) を見つけようとします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3315">This service attempts to locate a free TCP port (unbound) starting from the application supplied port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3316">この検索ロジックは、検索が最大ポート値 0xFFFF に到達すると、ラップアラウンドします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3316">The search logic will wrap around if the search happens to reach the maximum port value of 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3317">検索が成功すると、*free_port_ptr* によってポイントされている変数に空きポートが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3317">If  the search is successful, the free port is returned in the variable pointed to by *free_port_ptr*.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3318">*このサービスが別のスレッドから呼び出されて、同じポートが返される場合があります。このような競合状態を回避するには、アプリケーションでこのサービスと実際のクライアント ソケット バインドをミューテックスの保護下に置くことが必要になる場合があります*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3318">*This service can be called from another thread and have the same port returned. To prevent this race condition, the application may wish to place this service and the actual client socket bind under the protection of a mutex*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3319">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3319">Parameters</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3320">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3320">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3321">**port** 検索を開始するポート番号 (1 から 0xFFFF)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3321">**port** Port number to start search at (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3322">**free_port_ptr** 宛先の空きポートの戻り値へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3322">**free_port_ptr** Pointer to the destination free port return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3323">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3323">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 空きポートの検索に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3324">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful free port find.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) 空きポートが見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3325">**NX_NO_FREE_PORTS** (0x45) No free ports found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3326">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3327">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3328">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) 指定されたポート番号が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3329">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) The specified port number is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3330">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3330">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3331">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3331">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3332">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3332">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3333">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3333">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3334">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3334">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Locate a free TCP port, starting at port 12, on a previously
   created IP instance. */
status = nx_tcp_free_port_find(&ip_0, 12, &free_port);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, "free_port" contains the next free port
   on the IP instance. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3346">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3346">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3347">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3347">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3351">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3351">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3358">nx_tcp_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3359">TCP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3359">Retrieve information about TCP activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3360">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3360">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_info_get(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_invalid_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_connections,
    ULONG *tcp_disconnections,
    ULONG *tcp_connections_dropped,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3361">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3361">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3362">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの TCP アクティビティに関する情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3362">This service retrieves information about TCP activities for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3363">*宛先ポインターが NX_NULL の場合、その特定の情報は呼び出し元に返されません*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3363">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3364">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3364">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3365">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3365">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** 送信された TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3366">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** 送信された TCP バイトの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3367">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3368">**tcp_packets_received** 受信した TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3368">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** 受信した TCP バイトの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3369">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** 無効な TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3370">**tcp_invalid_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of invalid TCP packets.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** 破棄された TCP 受信パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3371">**tcp_receive_packets_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP receive packets dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** チェックサム エラーが発生している TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3372">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3373">**tcp_connections** TCP 接続の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3373">**tcp_connections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3374">**tcp_disconnections** TCP 切断の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3374">**tcp_disconnections** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP disconnections.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** 破棄された TCP 接続の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3375">**tcp_connections_dropped** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP connections dropped.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** 再送信された TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3376">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets retransmitted.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3377">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3377">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP 情報の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3378">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3379">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3386">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3386">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP information from previously created IP Instance
   ip_0. */
status = nx_tcp_info_get(&ip_0,
                         &tcp_packets_sent,
                         &tcp_bytes_sent,
                         &tcp_packets_received,
                         &tcp_bytes_received,
                         &tcp_invalid_packets,
                         &tcp_receive_packets_dropped,
                         &tcp_checksum_errors,
                         &tcp_connections,
                         &tcp_disconnections
                         &tcp_connections_dropped,
                         &tcp_retransmit_packets);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_accept"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3410">nx_tcp_server_socket_accept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3411">TCP 接続を受け入れます</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3411">Accept TCP connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3412">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3412">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3413">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3414">このサービスでは、以前にリッスン用に設定されたポートに対する、TCP クライアント ソケット接続要求を受け入れます (または受け入れる準備を行います)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3414">This service accepts (or prepares to accept) a TCP client socket connection request for a port that was previously set up for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3415">このサービスは、アプリケーションがリッスンまたは再リッスン サービスを呼び出した直後、またはクライアント接続が実際に存在する場合は、リッスン コールバック ルーチンが呼び出された後に呼び出されることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3415">This service may be called immediately after the application calls the listen or re-listen service or after the listen callback routine is called when the client connection is actually present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3416">接続をすぐに確立できない場合、サービスは指定された待機オプションに従って中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3416">If a connection cannot not be established right away, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3417">*サーバー ポートへのサーバー ソケットのバインドを削除するためにその接続が必要ではなくなった後、アプリケーションで **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** を呼び出す必要があります*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3417">*The application must call **nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept** after the connection is no longer needed to remove the server socket's binding to the server port*.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3418">*アプリケーション コールバック ルーチンは、IP のヘルパー スレッド内から呼び出されます*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3418">*Application callback routines are called from within the IP's helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3419">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3420">**socket_ptr** TCP サーバー ソケット制御ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3420">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP server socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3421">**wait_option** 接続を確立している最中のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3421">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3422">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3422">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3423">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3424">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3425">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3425">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3426">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3426">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP サーバー ソケットの受け入れに成功しました (パッシブ接続)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3427">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP server socket accept (passive connect).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) 指定されたサーバー ソケットはリッスン状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3428">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) The server socket supplied is not in a listen state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) 待機が指定されていないため、接続の試行を実行中です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3429">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, the connection attempt is in progress.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3430">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインター エラー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3431">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Socket pointer error.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3432">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3433">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3434">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3434">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3435">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3435">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3436">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3436">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3437">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3437">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3438">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3438">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
    /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
    tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
    /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
       example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
    /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
        initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the
        link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already been
        created
    */

    /* Create the server socket. */
    nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket,
                         "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

    /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
    nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                port_12_connect_request);

    /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
       "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client and then disconnecting.*/
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
    {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
        request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
           complete.*/
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
        if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

            /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
               message */
            nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                         NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
            nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                  sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                  &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

            /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

            /* Check for an error. */
            if (status)
            {
               /* Error, release the packet. */
               nx_packet_release(my_packet);
            }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3465">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3465">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3466">このサービスでは、指定された TCP ポートでのクライアント接続要求のリッスンを有効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3466">This service enables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3467">クライアント接続要求を受信すると、指定されたサーバー ソケットが指定されたポートにバインドされ、指定されたリッスン コールバック関数が呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3467">When a client connection request is received, the supplied server socket is bound to the specified port and the supplied listen callback function is called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3468">リッスン コールバック ルーチンの処理は、全面的にアプリケーションによって決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3468">The listen callback routine's processing is completely up to the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3469">それに含まれているロジックにより、後から受け入れ操作を実行するアプリケーション スレッドがウェイクアップされる場合もあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3469">It may contain logic to wake up an application thread that subsequently performs an accept operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3470">このソケットの受け入れ処理で中断しているスレッドが既にアプリケーションにある場合、リッスン コールバック ルーチンは必要ではない可能性があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3470">If the application already has a thread suspended on accept processing for this socket, the listen callback routine may not be needed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3471">そのアプリケーションで同じポート上の追加のクライアント接続を処理する場合は、次の接続のために使用可能なソケット (CLOSED 状態のソケット) を使用して ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** を呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3471">If the application wishes to handle additional client connections on the same port, the ***nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten*** must be called with an available socket (a socket in the CLOSED state) for the next connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3472">再リッスン サービスが呼び出されるまで、追加のクライアント接続はキューに入れられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3472">Until the re-listen service is called, additional client connections are queued.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3473">キューの最大深度を超えた場合は、新しい接続要求をキューできるようにするため、最も古い接続要求が破棄されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3473">When the maximum queue depth is exceeded, the oldest connection request is dropped in favor of queuing the new connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3474">キューの最大深度は、このサービスによって指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3474">The maximum queue depth is specified by this service.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3475">*アプリケーション コールバック ルーチンは、内部の IP ヘルパー スレッドから呼び出されます*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3475">*Application callback routines are called from the internal IP helper thread*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3476">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3477">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3477">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3478">**port** リッスンするポート番号 (1 から 0xFFFF)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3478">**port** Port number to listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3479">**socket_ptr** 接続に使用するソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3479">**socket_ptr** Pointer to socket to use for the connection.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3480">**listen_queue_size** キューに入れることができるクライアント接続要求の数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3480">**listen_queue_size** Number of client connection requests that can be queued.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3481">**listen_callback** 接続を受信したときに呼び出すアプリケーション関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3481">**listen_callback** Application function to call when the connection is received.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3482">null 値が指定されている場合、リッスン コールバック機能は無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3482">If a NULL is specified, the listen callback feature is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3483">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3483">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP ポートのリッスンの有効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3484">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port listen enable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) 使用できるリッスン要求構造体がこれ以上ありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3485">**NX_MAX_LISTEN** (0x33) No more listen request structures are available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3486">**_nx_api.h_** の定数 NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS により、許可されるアクティブなリッスン要求の数が定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3486">The constant NX_MAX_LISTEN_REQUESTS in **_nx_api.h_** defines how many active listen requests are possible.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) 指定されたサーバー ソケットが CLOSED 状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3487">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) 指定されたサーバー ソケットは既にポートにバインドされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3488">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) このポートに対するアクティブなリッスン要求が既に存在します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3489">**NX_DUPLICATE_LISTEN** (0x34) There is already an active listen request for this port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) 指定されたポートが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3490">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3491">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3492">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3493">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3495">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3495">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3498">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3498">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{
   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket.
   This example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{
NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;
   /* Assuming that:
      "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an
      initial count of 0 "my_ip" has already been created
      and the link is enabled "my_pool" packet pool has already
      been created.
   */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server
                        Socket",
                        NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                        NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                        NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
      each client and then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

        /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
           request is present. */
        tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

        /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection
           to complete. */
        status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

        /* Check for a successful connection. */
           if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
        {

              /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                 message. */
              nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                 NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

              /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
              nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                    sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                    &my_pool,
                                    NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {
                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

            /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
            nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }
         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called
            even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
         again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);
     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3522">nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3523">TCP ポートでクライアント接続を再リッスンします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3523">Re-listen for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3524">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3524">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port,
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3525">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3525">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3526">このサービスは、以前にリッスン用に設定されたポートで接続を受信した後に呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3526">This service is called after a connection has been received on a port that was setup previously for listening.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3527">このサービスの主な目的は、次のクライアント接続に新しいサーバー ソケットを提供することです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3527">The main purpose of this service is to provide a new server socket for the next client connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3528">キューに入れられている接続要求がある場合、このサービス呼び出し中にその接続が直ちに処理されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3528">If a connection request is queued, the connection will be processed immediately during this service call.</span></span>

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3529">*元のリッスン要求によって指定されたのと同じコールバック ルーチンが、この新しいサーバー ソケットのための接続が存在する場合にも呼び出されます*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3529">*The same callback routine specified by the original listen request is also called when a connection is present for this new server socket*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3530">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3530">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3531">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3531">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3532">**port** 再リッスンするポート番号 (1 から 0xFFFF)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3532">**port** Port number to re-listen on (1 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3533">**socket_ptr** 次のクライアント接続に使用するソケット。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3533">**socket_ptr** Socket to use for the next client connection.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3534">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3534">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP ポートの再リッスンに成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3535">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP port re-listen.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) 指定されたサーバー ソケットが CLOSED 状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3536">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) The supplied server socket is not in a closed state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) 指定されたサーバー ソケットは既にポートにバインドされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3537">**NX_ALREADY_BOUND** (0x22) The supplied server socket is already bound to a port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) このポートには有効なソケット ポインターが既に存在するか、指定されたポートでリッスン要求がアクティブになっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3538">**NX_INVALID_RELISTEN** (0x47) There is already a valid socket pointer for this port or the port specified does not have a listen request active.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) NX_SUCCESS と同じですが、キューに入れられた接続要求が既に存在しており、この呼び出し中にその要求が処理されたという点が異なります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3539">**NX_CONNECTION_PENDING** (0x48) Same as NX_SUCCESS, except there was a queued connection request and it was processed during this call.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) 指定されたポートが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3540">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはリッスン コールバック ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3541">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or listen callback pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3542">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3543">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3544">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3544">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3545">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3545">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3546">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3546">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3547">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3547">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3548">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3548">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL my_pool;
NX_IP my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

   /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread.*/
   tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This
      example doesn't use this callback. */
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

   /* Assuming that:
     "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial
     count of 0.
    "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled.
    "my_pool" packet pool has already been created. */

   /* Create the server socket. */
   nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                                 NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                                 NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                                 NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

   /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
   nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                               port_12_connect_request);

   /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending
      "Hello_and_Goodbye" to each client then disconnecting. */
   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
   {

       /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection
          request is present. */
       tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

       /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to
          complete. */
       status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye"
                message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                                   &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
         }

         /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is
            called even if disconnect or accept fails. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

         /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket
            again. */
         nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }

     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3572">nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3573">リッスン ポートとのソケットの関連付けを削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3573">Remove socket association with listening port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3574">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3574">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3575">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3575">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3576">このサービスでは、このサーバー ソケットと指定されたサーバー ポートとの間の関連付けを削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3576">This service removes the association between this server socket and the specified server port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3577">切断の後、または受け入れ呼び出しが失敗した後に、アプリケーションからこのサービスを呼び出す必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3577">The application must call this service after a disconnection or after an unsuccessful accept call.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3578">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3579">**socket_ptr** 以前に設定されたサーバーのソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3579">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously setup server socket instance.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3580">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3580">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) サーバー ソケットの受け入れ解除に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3581">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful server socket unaccept.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) サーバー ソケットが不適切な状態のため、切断されていないおそれがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3582">**NX_NOT_LISTEN_STATE** (0x36) Server socket is in an improper state, and is probably not disconnected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3583">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3584">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3585">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

```c
{

NX_PACKET  *my_packet;
UINT       status, i;

       /* Check for a successful connection. */
          if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
       {
             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet,
                      "Hello_and_Goodbye",sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"),
                      &my_pool, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3614">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3615">TCP ポートでのクライアント接続のリッスンを無効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3615">Disable listening for client connection on TCP port</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3616">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3616">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3617">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3617">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3618">このサービスでは、指定された TCP ポートでのクライアント接続要求のリッスンを無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3618">This service disables listening for a client connection request on the specified TCP port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3619">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3619">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3620">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3620">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3621">**port** リッスンを無効にするポートの数 (0 から 0xFFFF)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3621">**port** Number of port to disable listening (0 through 0xFFFF).</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3622">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3622">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP のリッスンの無効化に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3623">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP listen disable.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) 指定されたポートに対してリッスンが有効になっていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3624">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Listening was not enabled for the specified port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3625">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) 指定されたポートが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3625">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3626">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3627">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3628">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3629">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3630">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3631">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3631">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3632">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3632">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3633">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3633">Example</span></span>

```c
NX_PACKET_POOL       my_pool;
NX_IP                my_ip;
NX_TCP_SOCKET        server_socket;

void port_12_connect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, UINT port)
{

     /* Simply set the semaphore to wake up the server thread. */
     tx_semaphore_put(&port_12_semaphore);
}

void port_12_disconnect_request(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{

     /* The client has initiated a disconnect on this socket. This example
        doesn't use this callback.*/
}

void port_12_server_thread_entry(ULONG id)
{

NX_PACKET *my_packet;
UINT status, i;

     /* Assuming that:
       "port_12_semaphore" has already been created with an initial count
        of 0 "my_ip" has already been created and the link is enabled
       "my_pool" packet pool has already been created
     */

     /* Create the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_create(&my_ip, &server_socket, "Port 12 Server Socket",
                          NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                          NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE, 100,
                          NX_NULL, port_12_disconnect_request);

     /* Setup server listening on port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_listen(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket, 5,
                                 port_12_connect_request);

     /* Loop to process 5 server connections, sending "Hello_and_Goodbye" to
        each client and then disconnecting. */
     for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
     {

         /* Get the semaphore that indicates a client connection request is
            present. */
         tx_semaphore_get(&port_12_semaphore, TX_WAIT_FOREVER);

         /* Wait for 200 ticks for the client socket connection to complete.*/
         status = nx_tcp_server_socket_accept(&server_socket, 200);

         /* Check for a successful connection. */
         if (status == NX_SUCCESS)
         {

             /* Allocate a packet for the "Hello_and_Goodbye" message. */
             nx_packet_allocate(&my_pool, &my_packet, NX_TCP_PACKET,
                                NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Place "Hello_and_Goodbye" in the packet. */
             nx_packet_data_append(my_packet, "Hello_and_Goodbye",
                                   sizeof("Hello_and_Goodbye"), &my_pool,
                                   NX_WAIT_FOREVER);

             /* Send "Hello_and_Goodbye" to client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_send(&server_socket, my_packet, 200);

             /* Check for an error. */
             if (status)
             {

                /* Error, release the packet. */
                nx_packet_release(my_packet);
             }

             /* Now disconnect the server socket from the client. */
             nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&server_socket, 200);
          }

          /* Unaccept the server socket. Note that unaccept is called even if
             disconnect or accept fails. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_unaccept(&server_socket);

          /* Setup server socket for listening with this socket again. */
          nx_tcp_server_socket_relisten(&my_ip, 12, &server_socket);
     }
  
     /* We are now done so unlisten on server port 12. */
     nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten(&my_ip, 12);

     /* Delete the server socket. */
     nx_tcp_socket_delete(&server_socket);
}
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3657">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3658">取得可能なバイト数を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3658">Retrieves number of bytes available for retrieval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3659">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3659">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *bytes_available);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3660">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3661">このサービスでは、指定された TCP ソケットで取得可能なバイト数を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3661">This service obtains the number of bytes available for retrieval in the specified TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3662">TCP ソケットが既に接続されている必要があることにご注意ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3662">Note that the TCP socket must already be connected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3663">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3664">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成され、接続されている TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3664">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3665">**bytes_available** 使用可能なバイトの宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3665">**bytes_available** Pointer to destination for bytes available.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3666">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3667">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) サービスが正常に実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3667">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3668">読み取り可能なバイト数が呼び出し元に返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3668">Number of bytes available for read is returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3669">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) ソケットが接続状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3669">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3670">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3670">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3671">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3671">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3672">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3672">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3673">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3674">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3674">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3675">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3675">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3676">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3676">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3677">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3677">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the bytes available for retrieval on the specified socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available(&my_socket,&bytes_available);

/* Is status = NX_SUCCESS, the available bytes is returned in
   bytes_available. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3701">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3702">TCP クライアントまたはサーバー ソケットを作成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3702">Create TCP client or server socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3703">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3703">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_create(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr, 
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    CHAR *name, 
    ULONG type_of_service, 
    ULONG fragment,
    UINT time_to_live, 
    ULONG window_size,
    VOID (*urgent_data_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr),
    VOID (*disconnect_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3704">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3705">このサービスでは、指定された IP インスタンスの TCP クライアントまたはサーバー ソケットを作成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3705">This service creates a TCP client or server socket for the specified IP instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3706">*アプリケーション コールバック ルーチンは、この IP インスタンスに関連付けられているスレッドから呼び出されます*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3706">*Application callback routines are called from the thread associated with this IP instance*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3707">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3708">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3708">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3709">**socket_ptr** 新しい TCP ソケット制御ブロックへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3709">**socket_ptr** Pointer to new TCP socket control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3710">**name** この TCP ソケットのアプリケーション名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3710">**name** Application name for this TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3711">**type_of_service** 送信のためのサービスの種類を定義します。有効な値は次のとおりです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3711">**type_of_service** Defines the type of service for the transmission, legal values are as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3712">**NX_IP_NORMAL** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3713">**NX_IP_MIN_DELAY** (0x00100000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3714">**NX_IP_MAX_DATA** (0x00080000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3715">**NX_IP_MAX_RELIABLE** (0x00040000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3716">**NX_IP_MIN_COST** (0x00020000)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3717">**fragment** IP のフラグメント化を許可するかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3717">**fragment** Specifies whether or not IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3718">NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) が指定されている場合は、IP のフラグメント化が許可されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3718">If NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY\*\* (0x0) is specified, IP fragmenting is allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3719">NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) が指定されている場合は、IP のフラグメント化が無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3719">If NX_DONT_FRAGMENT (0x4000) is specified, IP fragmenting is disabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3720">**time_to_live** このパケットが破棄されるまでに通過できるルーターの数を定義する 8 ビット値を指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3720">**time_to_live** Specifies the 8-bit value that defines how many routers this packet can pass before being thrown away.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3721">既定値は NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE によって指定されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3721">The default value is specified by NX_IP_TIME_TO_LIVE.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3722">**window_size** このソケットの受信キューで許可される最大バイト数を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3722">**window_size** Defines the maximum number of bytes allowed in the receive queue for this socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3723">**urgent_data_callback** 受信ストリームで緊急データが検出されるたびに呼び出されるアプリケーション関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3723">**urgent_data_callback** Application function that is called whenever urgent data is detected in the receive stream.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3724">この値が NX_NULL の場合、緊急データは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3724">If this value is NX_NULL, urgent data is ignored.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3725">**disconnect_callback** 接続のもう一方の終端でソケットによる切断が発行されるたびに呼び出されるアプリケーション関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3725">**disconnect_callback** Application function that is called whenever a disconnect is issued by the socket at the other end of the connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3726">この値が NX_NULL の場合、切断コールバック関数は無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3726">If this value is NX_NULL, the disconnect callback function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3727">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3727">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP クライアント ソケットの作成に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3728">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP client socket create.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) サービスの種類、フラグメント、ウィンドウ サイズ、または有効期限オプションが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3729">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) Invalid type-of-service, fragment, invalid window size, or time-tolive option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP またはソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3730">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP or socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3731">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3732">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3733">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3733">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3734">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3734">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3735">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3735">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3736">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3736">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3737">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3737">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Create a TCP client socket on the previously created IP instance,
   with normal delivery, IP fragmentation enabled, 0x80 time to
   live, a 200-byte receive window, no urgent callback routine, and
   the "client_disconnect" routine to handle disconnection initiated
   from the other end of the connection. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_create(&ip_0, &client_socket,
                             "Client Socket",
                             NX_IP_NORMAL, NX_FRAGMENT_OKAY,
                             0x80, 200, NX_NULL
                             client_disconnect);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is created and ready
   to be bound. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3761">nx_tcp_socket_delete</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3762">TCP ソケットを削除します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3762">Delete TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3763">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3763">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_delete(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3764">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3764">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3765">このサービスでは、以前に作成された TCP ソケットを削除します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3765">This service deletes a previously created TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3766">そのソケットがまだバインドされているか接続されている場合、サービスからエラー コードが返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3766">If the socket is still bound or connected, the service returns an error code.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3767">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3768">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3768">**socket_ptr** Previously created TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3769">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットの削除に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3770">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket delete.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) ソケットが作成されていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3771">**NX_NOT_CREATED** (0x27) Socket was not created.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) ソケットはまだバインドされています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3772">**NX_STILL_BOUND** (0x42) Socket is still bound.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3773">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3774">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3775">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3776">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3777">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3777">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3778">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3778">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3779">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3779">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3780">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3780">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Delete a previously created TCP client socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_delete(&client_socket);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the client socket is deleted. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3793">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3793">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3794">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3794">nx_tcp_socket_bytes_available</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3795">nx_tcp_socket_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3795">nx_tcp_socket_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3796">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3796">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3797">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3797">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3799">nx_tcp_socket_receive_queue_max_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3799">nx_tcp_socket_receive_queue_max_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3801">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3801">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3802">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3802">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3804">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3805">クライアントとサーバーのソケット接続を切断します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3805">Disconnect client and server socket connections</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3806">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3806">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3807">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3808">このサービスでは、確立されたクライアントまたはサーバーのソケット接続を切断します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3808">This service disconnects an established client or server socket connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3809">サーバー ソケットを切断した場合、その後に受け入れ解除要求が発行される必要がありますが、切断されているクライアント ソケットは別の接続要求を受け入れられる状態のままになります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3809">A disconnect of a server socket should be followed by an unaccept request, while a client socket that is disconnected is left in a state ready for another connection request.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3810">切断プロセスをすぐに完了できない場合、サービスは指定された待機オプションに従って中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3810">If the disconnect process cannot finish immediately, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3811">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3812">**socket_ptr** 以前に接続されたクライアントまたはサーバー ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3812">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3813">**wait_option** 切断を実行中のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3813">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves while the disconnection is in progress.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3814">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3814">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3815">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3816">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3817">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3817">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3818">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3818">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットの切断に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3819">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket disconnect.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) 指定されたソケットは接続されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3820">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Specified socket is not connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) 切断を実行中です。待機は指定されていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3821">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) Disconnect is in progress, no wait was specified.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3822">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3823">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3824">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3825">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3826">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3827">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3827">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3828">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3828">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3829">はい</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3829">Yes</span></span> 

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3830">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3830">Example</span></span> 

```c
/* Disconnect from a previously established connection and wait a
   maximum of 400 timer ticks. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect(&client_socket, 400);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the previously connected socket (either
   as a result of the client socket connect or the server accept) is
   disconnected. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3854">nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3855">TCP 切断完了通知コールバック関数をインストールします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3855">Install TCP disconnect complete notify callback function</span></span>
 
### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3856">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3856">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_disconnect_complete_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3857">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3858">このサービスを使用すると、ソケットの切断操作の完了後に呼び出されるコールバック関数が登録されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3858">This service registers a callback function which is invoked after a socket disconnect operation is completed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3859">TCP ソケット切断完了コールバック関数は、オプション ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** を定義して NetX Duo が構築されている場合に使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3859">The TCP socket disconnect complete callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3860">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3861">**socket_ptr** 以前に接続されたクライアントまたはサーバー ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3861">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** インストールされるコールバック関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3862">**tcp_disconnect_complete_notify** The callback function to be installed.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3863">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3863">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コールバック関数が正常に登録されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3864">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registered the callback function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) 拡張通知機能が NetX Duo ライブラリに組み込まれていません。NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3865">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library NX_PTR_ERROR\*\* (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3866">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP 機能が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3867">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3868">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3868">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3869">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3869">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3870">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3870">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3871">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3871">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3872">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3872">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the disconnect complete notify callback function. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_disconnect_complete_notify(&client_socket,
                                                  callback);
```
