- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3884">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3884">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3885">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3886">TCP 確立通知コールバック関数を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3886">Set TCP establish notify callback function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3887">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3887">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_establish_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3888">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3889">このサービスを使用すると、TCP ソケットが接続を確立した後に呼び出されるコールバック関数が登録されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3889">This service registers a callback function, which is called after a TCP socket makes a connection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3890">TCP ソケット確立コールバック関数は、オプション ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** を定義して NetX Duo が構築されている場合に使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3890">The TCP socket establish callback function is available if NetX Duo is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY_SUPPORT*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3891">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3892">**socket_ptr** 以前に接続されたクライアントまたはサーバー ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3892">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** TCP 接続が確立された後に呼び出されるコールバック関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3893">**tcp_establish_notify** Callback function invoked after a TCP connection is established.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3894">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3894">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 通知関数が正常に設定されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3895">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sets the notify function.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) 拡張通知機能が NetX Duo ライブラリに組み込まれていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3896">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The extended notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3897">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3898">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP は、このアプリケーションで有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3899">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP has not been enabled by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3900">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3901">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3901">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3902">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3902">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3903">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3903">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3904">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3904">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer "callback" as the notify function NetX
   Duo will call when the connection is in the established state. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify(&client_socket, callback);
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3918">nx_tcp_socket_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3919">TCP ソケット アクティビティに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3919">Retrieve information about TCP socket activities</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3920">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3920">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_sent,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_received,
    ULONG *tcp_bytes_received,
    ULONG *tcp_retransmit_packets,
    ULONG *tcp_packets_queued,
    ULONG *tcp_checksum_errors,
    ULONG *tcp_socket_state,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
    ULONG *tcp_transmit_window,
    ULONG *tcp_receive_window);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3921">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3922">このサービスでは、指定された TCP ソケット インスタンスの TCP ソケット アクティビティに関する情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3922">This service retrieves information about TCP socket activities for the specified TCP socket instance.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3923">*宛先ポインターが NX_NULL の場合、その特定の情報は呼び出し元に返されません*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3923">*If a destination pointer is NX_NULL, that particular information is not returned to the caller*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3924">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3925">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3925">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** ソケットで送信された TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3926">**tcp_packets_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP packets sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** ソケットで送信された TCP バイトの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3927">**tcp_bytes_sent** Pointer to destination for the total number of TCP bytes sent on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3928">**tcp_packets_received** ソケットで受信した TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3928">**tcp_packets_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** ソケットで受信した TCP バイトの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3929">**tcp_bytes_received** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP bytes received on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** TCP パケット再送信の合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3930">**tcp_retransmit_packets** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packet retransmissions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** ソケットでキューに入れられた TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3931">**tcp_packets_queued** Pointer to destination of the total number of queued TCP packets on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** ソケットでチェックサム エラーが発生している TCP パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3932">**tcp_checksum_errors** Pointer to destination of the total number of TCP packets with checksum errors on socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3933">**tcp_socket_state** ソケットの現在の状態の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3933">**tcp_socket_state** Pointer to destination of the socket’s current state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** ACK を待機してキューに入れられたままになっている送信パケットの合計数の宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3934">**tcp_transmit_queue_depth** Pointer to destination of the total number of transmit packets still queued waiting for ACK.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** 現在の送信ウィンドウ サイズの宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3935">**tcp_transmit_window** Pointer to destination of the current transmit window size.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3936">**tcp_receive_window** 現在の受信ウィンドウ サイズの宛先へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3936">**tcp_receive_window** Pointer to destination of the current receive window size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3937">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3937">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) TCP ソケット情報の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3938">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful TCP socket information retrieval.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3939">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3940">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3941">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3942">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3942">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3943">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3943">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3944">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3944">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3945">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3945">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3946">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3946">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Retrieve TCP socket information from previously created
   socket_0.*/
status = nx_tcp_socket_info_get(&socket_0,
                                &tcp_packets_sent,
                                &tcp_bytes_sent,
                                &tcp_packets_received,
                                &tcp_bytes_received,
                                &tcp_retransmit_packets,
                                &tcp_packets_queued,
                                &tcp_checksum_errors,
                                &tcp_socket_state,
                                &tcp_transmit_queue_depth,
                                &tcp_transmit_window,
                                &tcp_receive_window);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, TCP socket information was retrieved. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3970">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3971">ソケットの MSS を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3971">Get MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3972">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3972">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3973">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3973">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3974">このサービスでは、指定されたソケットのローカルの最大セグメント サイズ (MSS) を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3974">This service retrieves the specified socket's local Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3975">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3976">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成されたソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3976">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3977">**mss** MSS を返す宛先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3977">**mss** Destination for returning MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3978">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3978">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) MSS の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3979">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケットまたは MSS 宛先ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3980">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3981">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) 呼び出し元がスレッドでも初期化でもありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3982">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3983">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3984">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3985">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3985">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-3986">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3986">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-3987">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3987">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS for the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket's current MSS value. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-3995">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-3995">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4000">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4000">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4001">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4002">ピア TCP ソケットの MSS を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4002">Get MSS of the peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4003">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4003">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4004">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4004">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4005">このサービスでは、ピア ソケットによってアドバタイズされた最大セグメント サイズ (MSS) を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4005">This service retrieves the Maximum Segment Size (MSS) advertised by the peer socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4006">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4006">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4007">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成され、接続されているソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4007">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created and connected socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4008">**mss** MSS を返す宛先。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4008">**mss** Destination for returning the MSS.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4009">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4009">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ピア MSS の取得に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4010">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful peer MSS get.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケットまたは MSS 宛先ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4011">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or MSS destination pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4012">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) 呼び出し元がスレッドでも初期化でもありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4013">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4014">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4014">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4015">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4015">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4016">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4016">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4017">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4017">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4018">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4018">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Get the MSS of the connected peer to the socket "my_socket". */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get(&my_socket, &mss_value);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the "mss_value" variable contains the
   socket peer’s advertised MSS value. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4023">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4023">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4024">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4024">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4025">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4025">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4026">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4026">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4027">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4027">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4028">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4028">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4029">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4029">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4030">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4030">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4031">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4031">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_mss_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4032">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4033">ソケットの MSS を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4033">Set MSS of socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4034">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4034">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    ULONG mss);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4035">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4035">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4036">このサービスでは、指定されたソケットの最大セグメント サイズ (MSS) を設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4036">This service sets the specified socket's Maximum Segment Size (MSS).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4037">MSS 値は、ネットワーク インターフェイスの IP MTU の範囲内で指定して、IP および TCP ヘッダーのための余地を残す必要があることにご注意ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4037">Note the MSS value must be within the network interface IP MTU, allowing room for IP and TCP headers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4038">TCP ソケットで接続プロセスが開始される前にこのサービスを使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4038">This service should be used before a TCP socket starts the connection process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4039">TCP 接続が確立された後にこのサービスを使用した場合、新しい値は接続に影響しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4039">If the service is used after a TCP connection is established, the new value has no effect on the connection.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4040">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4041">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成されたソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4041">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4042">**mss** 設定する MSS の値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4042">**mss** Value of MSS to set.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4043">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4043">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) MSS の設定に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4044">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful MSS set.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) 指定された MSS 値が大きすぎます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4045">**NX_SIZE_ERROR** (0x09) Specified MSS value is too large.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP 接続が確立されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4046">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) TCP connection has not been established</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4047">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4048">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) 呼び出し元がスレッドでも初期化でもありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4049">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Caller is not a thread or initialization.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4050">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4051">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4052">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4052">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4053">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4053">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4054">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4054">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the MSS of the socket "my_socket" to 1000 bytes. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_mss_set(&my_socket, 1000);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the MSS of "my_socket" is 1000 bytes. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4055">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4055">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4061">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4061">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4062">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4062">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4063">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4063">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4064">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4064">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4065">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4065">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4066">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4066">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4067">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4067">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4068">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4069">ピア TCP ソケットに関する情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4069">Retrieve information about peer TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4070">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4070">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4071">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4072">このサービスでは、IPv4 ネットワーク経由で接続されている TCP ソケットのピア IP アドレスとポート情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4072">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over IPv4 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4073">これに相当し、IPv6 ネットワークもサポートするサービスは ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4073">The equivalent service that also supports IPv6 network is ***nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4074">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4075">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4075">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4076">**peer_ip_address** ピア IP アドレスの宛先へのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4076">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to destination for peer IP address, in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4077">**peer_port** ピア ポート番号の宛先へのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4077">**peer_port** Pointer to destination for peer port number, in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4078">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4078">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) サービスが正常に実行されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4079">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Service executes successfully.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4080">ピア IP アドレスとポート番号が呼び出し元に返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4080">Peer IP address and port number are returned to the caller.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) ソケットが接続状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4081">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is not in a connected state.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4082">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4083">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP is not enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4084">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4085">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4085">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4086">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4086">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4087">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4087">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4088">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4088">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4089">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4089">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Obtain peer IP address and port on the specified TCP socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(&my_socket, &peer_ip_address,
                                     &peer_port);

/* If status = NX_SUCCESS, the data was successfully obtained. */
```
### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4090">参照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4090">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4094">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4094">nx_tcp_socket_establish_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4095">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4095">nx_tcp_socket_mss_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4096">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4096">nx_tcp_socket_mss_peer_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4097">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4097">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4098">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4098">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4099">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4099">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4100">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4100">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4101">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4101">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4102">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4102">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4103">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4104">TCP 送信キュー通知関数を設定します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4104">Set the TCP transmit queue notify function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4105">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4105">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(
              NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
              VOID(*tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4106">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4107">このサービスでは、アプリケーションによって指定された送信キューの深度更新通知関数が設定されます。指定されたソケットで送信キューからパケットが解放されて、キューの深度の制限超過が収まったと判別されるたびに、これが呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4107">This service sets the transmit queue depth update notify function specified by the application, which is called whenever the specified socket determines that it has released packets from the transmit queue such that the queue depth is no longer exceeding its limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4108">キューの深度が原因でアプリケーションが送信時にブロックされる場合、このコールバック関数は、送信を再開してよいことをアプリケーションに通知する役割を果たします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4108">If an application would be blocked on transmit due to queue depth, the callback function serves as a notification to the application that it may start transmitting again.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4109">このサービスは、オプション ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** を定義して NetX Duo ライブラリが構築されている場合にのみ使用できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4109">This service is available only if the NetX Duo library is built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_TCP_QUEUE_DEPTH_UPDATE_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4110">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4110">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4111">**socket_ptr** ソケット構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4111">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the socket structure</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** インストールする通知関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4112">**tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify** The notify function to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4113">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4113">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 通知関数が正常にインストールされました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4114">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) TCP ソケットのキュー深度通知機能が NetX Duo ライブラリに組み込まれていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4115">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) The TCP socket queue depth notify feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット制御ブロックまたは通知関数へのポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4116">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer to the socket control block or the notify function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4117">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP 機能が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4118">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4119">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4119">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4120">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4120">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4121">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4121">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4122">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4122">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4123">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4123">Example</span></span>

```c
VOID tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr)
{
   /* Notify the application to resume sending. */

}
/* Install the TCP transmit queue notify function .*/
status = nxd_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set(&tcp_socket,
                                  tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the callback function is successfully
   installed. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4131">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4131">nx_tcp_socket_mss_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4132">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4132">nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4133">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4133">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4134">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4134">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4135">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4135">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4136">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4136">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4137">nx_tcp_socket_receive</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4138">TCP ソケットからデータを受信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4138">Receive data from TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4139">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4139">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET **packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4140">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4141">このサービスでは、指定されたソケットから TCP データを受信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4141">This service receives TCP data from the specified socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4142">指定されたソケットでキューに入れられたデータが存在しない場合は、指定された待機オプションに基づいて呼び出し元が中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4142">If no data is queued on the specified socket, the caller suspends based on the supplied wait option.</span></span>

> [!CAUTION]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4143">*NX_SUCCESS が返された場合は、そのアプリケーションが、不要になった受信パケットを解放する役割を果たします*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4143">*If NX_SUCCESS is returned, the application is responsible for releasing the received packet when it is no longer needed*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4144">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4145">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4145">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4146">**packet_ptr** TCP パケット ポインターへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4146">**packet_ptr** Pointer to TCP packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4147">**wait_option** このソケットで現在キューに入れられたデータが存在しない場合のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4147">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if do data are currently queued on this socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4148">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4148">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4149">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4150">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4151">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4151">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4152">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4152">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケット データの受信に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4153">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket data receive.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) ソケットがまだバインドされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4154">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound yet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) 受信したデータはありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4155">**NX_NO_PACKET** (0x01) No data received.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4156">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) ソケットはもう接続されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4157">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) The socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケットまたはリターン パケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4158">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket or return packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4159">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4160">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4161">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4161">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4162">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4162">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4163">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4163">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4164">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4164">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4165">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4165">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Receive a packet from the previously created and connected TCP
   client socket. If no packet is available, wait for 200 timer
   ticks before giving up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive(&client_socket, &packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the received packet is pointed to by
   "packet_ptr". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4189">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4190">受信したパケットをアプリケーションに通知します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4190">Notify application of received packets</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4191">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4191">Prototype</span></span>   

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr, 
    VOID (*tcp_receive_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4192">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4192">Description</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4193">このサービスでは、アプリケーションによって指定されたコールバック関数を使用して、受信通知関数ポインターを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4193">This service configures the receive notify function pointer with the callback function specified by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4194">そのようにすると、そのソケットで 1 つ以上のパケットを受信するたびに、このコールバック関数が呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4194">This callback function is then called whenever one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4195">NX_NULL ポインターが指定されている場合、この通知関数は無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4195">If a NX_NULL pointer is supplied, the notify function is disabled.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4196">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4197">**socket_ptr** TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4197">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** ソケットで 1 つ以上のパケットを受信したときに呼び出されるアプリケーション コールバック関数ポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4198">**tcp_receive_notify** Application callback function pointer that is called when one or more packets are received on the socket.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4199">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4199">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットの受信通知に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4200">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket receive notify.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4201">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4202">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP 機能が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4203">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4204">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4205">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4205">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4206">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4206">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4207">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4207">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4208">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4208">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Setup a receive packet callback function for the "client_socket"
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify(&client_socket,
                                      my_receive_notify);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, NetX Duo will call the function named
   "my_receive_notify" whenever one or more packets are received for
   "client_socket". */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4222">nx_tcp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4223">TCP ソケット経由でデータを送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4223">Send data through a TCP socket</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4224">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4224">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_send(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4225">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4225">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4226">このサービスでは、以前に接続された TCP ソケット経由で TCP データを送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4226">This service sends TCP data through a previously connected TCP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4227">受信側の最後にアドバタイズされたウィンドウ サイズがこの要求未満である場合、指定された待機オプションに基づいて、サービスが必要に応じて中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4227">If the receiver's last advertised window size is less than this request, the service optionally suspends based on the wait option specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4228">このサービスにより、MSS を超えるパケット データが IP 層に送信されないことが保証されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4228">This service guarantees that no packet data larger than MSS is sent to the IP layer.</span></span> 

> [!WARNING]  
> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4229">*エラーが返されない限り、この呼び出しの後にアプリケーションでパケットを解放することはできません。これを行うと、送信後にネットワーク ドライバーでもパケットの解放が試みられるため、予期しない結果が発生します*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4229">*Unless an error is returned, the application should not release the packet after this call. Doing so will cause unpredictable results because the network driver will also try to release the packet after transmission*.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4230">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4231">**socket_ptr** 以前に接続された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4231">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP データ パケット ポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4232">**packet_ptr** TCP data packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4233">**wait_option** 要求が受信側のウィンドウ サイズを超える場合のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4233">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the request is greater than the window size of the receiver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4234">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4234">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4235">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4236">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4237">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4237">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4238">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットの送信に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket send.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) ソケットがどのポートにもバインドされていませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4240">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket was not bound to any port.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) 適切な送信インターフェイスが見つかりませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4241">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) ソケットはもう接続されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4242">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket is no longer connected.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) 要求が、受信側のアドバタイズされたウィンドウ サイズ (バイト単位) を超えています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4243">**NX_WINDOW_OVERFLOW** (0x39) Request is greater than receiver’s advertised window size in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4244">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) パケットが割り当てられていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4245">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) 転送キューの最大深度に達しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4246">**NX_TX_QUEUE_DEPTH** (0x49) Maximum transmit queue depth has been reached.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) パケットの追加ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4247">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4248">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4249">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4250">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) パケットの先頭追加ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4251">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Packet prepend pointer is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4252">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4252">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4253">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4253">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4254">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4254">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4255">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4255">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4256">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4256">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Send a packet out on the previously created and connected TCP
   socket. If the receive window on the other side of the connection
   is less than the packet size, wait 200 timer ticks before giving
   up. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr, 200);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the packet has been sent! */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4269">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4269">nx_tcp_server_socket_unlisten</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_state_wait"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4280">nx_tcp_socket_state_wait</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4281">TCP ソケットが特定の状態になるのを待機します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4281">Wait for TCP socket to enter specific state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4282">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4282">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    UINT desired_state,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4283">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4283">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4284">このサービスでは、ソケットが目的の状態になるのを待機します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4284">This service waits for the socket to enter the desired state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4285">ソケットが目的の状態でない場合、サービスは指定された待機オプションに従って中断されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4285">If the socket is not in the desired state, the service suspends according to the supplied wait option.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4286">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4286">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4287">**socket_ptr** 以前に接続された TCP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4287">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected TCP socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4288">**desired_state** 目的の TCP 状態。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4288">**desired_state** Desired TCP state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4289">有効な TCP ソケットの状態は、次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4289">Valid TCP socket states are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4290">**NX_TCP_CLOSED** (0x01)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4291">**NX_TCP_LISTEN_STATE** (0x02)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4292">**NX_TCP_SYN_SENT** (0x03)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4293">**NX_TCP_SYN_RECEIVED** (0x04)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4294">**NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED** (0x05)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4295">**NX_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT** (0x06)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4296">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_1** (0x07)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4297">**NX_TCP_FIN_WAIT_2** (0x08)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4298">**NX_TCP_CLOSING** (0x09)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4299">**NX_TCP_TIMED_WAIT** (0x0A)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4300">**NX_TCP_LAST_ACK** (0x0B)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4301">**wait_option** 要求された状態が存在しない場合のサービスの動作を定義します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4301">**wait_option** Defines how the service behaves if the requested state is not present.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4302">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4302">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4303">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4304">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4304">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4305">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4305">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 状態の待機に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4306">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful state wait.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4307">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) 指定された待機時間内に状態が存在しませんでした。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4308">**NX_NOT_SUCCESSFUL** (0x43) State not present within the specified wait time.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4309">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4310">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) このコンポーネントは有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4311">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) This component has not been enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) 目的のソケットの状態が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4312">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0A) The desired socket state is invalid.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4313">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4314">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4314">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4315">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4315">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4316">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4316">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4317">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4317">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Wait 300 timer ticks for the previously created socket to enter
   the established state in the TCP state machine. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_state_wait(&client_socket,
                                  NX_TCP_ESTABLISHED, 300);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket is now in the established
   state! */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4341">nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4342">時間指定された待機状態のコールバックをインストールします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4342">Install callback for timed wait state</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4343">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4343">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_timed_wait_callback)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4344">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4344">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4345">このサービスを使用すると、TCP ソケットが時間指定された待機状態になったときに呼び出されるコールバック関数が登録されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4345">This service registers a callback function which is invoked when the TCP socket is in timed wait state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4346">このサービスを使用するには、オプション ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** を定義して NetX Duo ライブラリを構築する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4346">To use this service, the NetX Duo library must be built with the option ***NX_ENABLE_EXTENDED_NOTIFY*** defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4347">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4348">**socket_ptr** 以前に接続されたクライアントまたはサーバー ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4348">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously connected client or server socket instance.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** 時間指定された待機コールバック関数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4349">**tcp_timed_wait_callback** The timed wait callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4350">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4350">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コールバック関数ソケットが正常に登録されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4351">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully registers the callback function socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) この拡張通知機能を有効にせずに NetX Duo ライブラリが構築されています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4352">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) NetX Duo library is built without the extended notify feature enabled.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4353">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4354">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP 機能が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4355">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4356">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4357">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4357">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4358">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4358">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4359">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4359">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4360">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4360">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Install the timed wait callback function */
nx_tcp_socket_timed_wait_callback(&client_socket, callback);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4370">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4370">nx_tcp_socket_queue_depth_notify_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4371">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4371">nx_tcp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4372">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4372">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4373">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4373">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4374">nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4375">ソケットの送信パラメーターを構成します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4375">Configure socket's transmit parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4376">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4376">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    ULONG max_queue_depth,
    ULONG timeout,
    ULONG max_retries,
    ULONG timeout_shift);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4377">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4378">このサービスでは、指定された TCP ソケットのさまざまな送信パラメーターを構成します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4378">This service configures various transmit parameters of the specified TCP socket.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4379">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4379">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4380">**socket_ptr** TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4380">**socket_ptr** Pointer to the TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4381">**max_queue_depth** 送信するためにキューに入れることができるパケットの最大数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4381">**max_queue_depth** Maximum number of packets allowed to be queued for transmission.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4382">**timeout** パケットをもう一度送信する前に ACK を待機する ThreadX タイマー ティック数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4382">**timeout** Number of ThreadX timer ticks an ACK is waited for before the packet is sent again.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4383">**max_retries** 許可される最大再試行回数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4383">**max_retries** Maximum number of retries allowed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4384">**timeout_shift** 再試行のたびにタイムアウトをシフトする値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4384">**timeout_shift** Value to shift the timeout for each subsequent retry.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4385">値が 0 の場合は、再試行が続いてもタイムアウトに変わりはありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4385">A value of 0, results in the same timeout between successive retries.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4386">値が 1 の場合は、再試行のたびにタイムアウトが 2 倍になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4386">A value of 1, doubles the timeout between retries.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4387">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4387">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) 送信ソケットの構成に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4388">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful transmit socket configure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4389">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) キューの深度オプションが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4390">**NX_OPTION_ERROR** (0x0a) Invalid queue depth option.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4391">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP 機能が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4392">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4393">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4394">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4394">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4395">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4395">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4396">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4397">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4397">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Configure the "client_socket" for a maximum transmit queue depth of
   12, 100 tick timeouts, a maximum of 20 retries, and a timeout double
   on each successive retry. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_transmit_configure(&client_socket,12,100,20,1);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS, the socket’s transmit retry has been
   configured. */
```

## <a name="nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4411">nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4412">アプリケーションにウィンドウ サイズの更新を通知します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4412">Notify application of window size updates</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4413">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4413">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    VOID (*tcp_window_update_notify)(NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr));
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4414">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4414">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4415">このサービスを使用すると、ソケット ウィンドウ更新コールバック ルーチンがインストールされます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4415">This service installs a socket window update callback routine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4416">指定されたソケットがリモート ホストのウィンドウ サイズが増加したことを示すパケットを受信するたびに、このルーチンが自動的に呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4416">This routine is called automatically whenever the specified socket receives a packet indicating an increase in the window size of the remote host.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4417">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4417">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4418">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4418">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** ウィンドウ サイズが変更されたときに呼び出されるコールバック ルーチン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4419">**tcp_window_update_notify** Callback routine to be called when the window size changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4420">null 値を指定すると、ウィンドウの変更更新は無効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4420">A value of NULL disables the window change update.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4421">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4421">Return Values</span></span>  

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) コールバック ルーチンがソケットにインストールされました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4422">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Callback routine is installed on the socket.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4423">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4424">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP 機能が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4425">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP feature is not enabled.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4426">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4427">初期化、スレッド</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4427">Initialization, threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4428">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4428">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-4429">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4429">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-4430">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-4430">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Set the function pointer to the windows update callback after creating the
   socket. */
status = nx_tcp_socket_window_update_notify_set(&data_socket,
                                                my_windows_update_callback);

/* Define the window callback function in the host application. */
void my_windows_update_callback(&data_socket)
{

/* Process update on increase TCP transmit socket window size. */
   return;
}
```
