## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6188">nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6189">IPv6 アドレスのハードウェア アドレスを検索します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6189">Locate Hardware Address for an IPv6 Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6190">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6190">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG *physical_msw,
    ULONG *physical_lsw
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6191">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6191">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6192">このサービスでは、IPv6 近隣探索キャッシュで、指定された IPv6 アドレスに関連付けられている物理ハードウェア アドレスの検索が試みられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6192">This service attempts to find a physical hardware address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied IPv6 address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6193">このネイバーに到達できるネットワーク インターフェイスのインデックスも、パラメーター *interface_index* で返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6193">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned in the parameter *interface_index.*</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6194">これに相当する NetX IPv4 サービスは、***nx_arp_hardware_address_find*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6194">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_hardware_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6195">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6195">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6196">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6196">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6197">**ip_address** 検索する IP アドレスへのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6197">**ip_address** Pointer to IP address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6198">**physical_msw** その物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47-32) へのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6198">**physical_msw** Pointer to the top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address, in host byte order</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6199">**physical_lsw** その物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31-0) へのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6199">**physical_lsw** Pointer to the lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6200">**interface_index** その IPv6 アドレスに到達できるネットワーク デバイスを指定するインターフェイスのインデックスを示す有効なメモリ位置へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6200">**interface_index** Pointer to the valid memory location for the interface index specifying the network device on which the IPv6 address can be reached.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6201">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6201">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) アドレスが正常に検出されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6202">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) マッピングが近隣キャッシュにありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6203">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Mapping not in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 機能が NetX Duo ライブラリに組み込まれていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6204">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) 指定された IP アドレスはバージョン 6 ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6205">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) The supplied IP address is not version 6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP インスタンスまたはストレージ スペースが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6206">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6207">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6208">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6209">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6209">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6210">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6210">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6211">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6211">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6212">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6212">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs an IP address on the primary network in order
   to obtain the hardware address it is mapped to in the neighbor
   cache able. */

NXD_ADDRESS  ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw, physical_lsw;
UINT  interface_index;

ip_address.nxd_ip_address_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0]   = 0x20011234;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1]   = 0x56780000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2]   = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3]   = 1;

/* Obtain the hardware address mapped to the supplied global IPv6
   address. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_hardware_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                            &physical_msw,
                                            &physical_lsw
                                            &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the hardware address returned in
   variables physical_msw and physical_lsw, the index of the network
   interface through which the neighbor can be reached is stored in
   interface_index. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_invalidate"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6229">nxd_nd_cache_invalidate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6230">近隣探索キャッシュを無効にします</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6230">Invalidate the Neighbor Discovery Cache</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6231">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6231">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_invalidate(NX_IP *ip_ptr);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6232">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6232">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6233">このサービスでは、IPv6 近隣探索キャッシュ全体を無効にします。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6233">This service invalidates the entire IPv6 neighbor discovery cache.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6234">このサービスは、ICMPv6 が有効化される前または後に呼び出すことができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6234">This service can be invoked either before or after ICMPv6 has been enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6235">このサービスは IPv4 接続には適用されないため、NetX でこれに相当するサービスはありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6235">This service is not applicable to IPv4 connectivity, so there is no NetX equivalent service.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6236">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6237">**ip_ptr** IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6237">**ip_ptr** Pointer to IP instance</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6238">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6238">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) キャッシュが正常に無効化されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6239">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cache successfully invalidated</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 機能が NetX Duo ライブラリに組み込まれていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6240">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP インスタンスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6241">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6242">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6243">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6243">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6244">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6244">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6245">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6245">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6246">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6246">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6247">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6247">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example invalidates the host neighbor cache table. */

/* Invalidate the cache table bound to the IP instance. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_invalidate (&ip_0);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, all entries in the neighbor cache table
   are invalidated. */
```

## <a name="nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6264">nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6265">物理アドレスに相当する IPv6 アドレスを取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6265">Retrieve IPv6 Address for a Physical Address</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6266">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6266">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(
    NX_IP *ip_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    ULONG physical_msw,
    ULONG physical_lsw,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6267">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6268">このサービスでは、IPv6 近隣探索キャッシュで、指定された物理アドレスに関連付けられている IPv6 アドレスの検索が試みられます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6268">This service attempts to find an IPv6 address in the IPv6 neighbor discovery cache that is associated with the supplied physical address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6269">このネイバーに到達できるネットワーク インターフェイスのインデックスも返されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6269">The index of the network interface through which the neighbor can be reached is also returned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6270">これに相当する NetX IPv4 サービスは、***nx_arp_ip_address_find*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6270">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_arp_ip_address_find***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6271">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6271">Parameters</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6272">**ip_ptr** 以前に作成された IP インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6272">**ip_ptr** Pointer to previously created IP instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6273">**ip_address** 有効な NXD_ADDRESS 構造体へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6273">**ip_address** Pointer to valid NXD_ADDRESS structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6274">**physical_msw** 検索する物理アドレスの上位 16 ビット (47-32) (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6274">**physical_msw** Top 16 bits (47-32) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6275">**physical_lsw** 検索する物理アドレスの下位 32 ビット (31-0) (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6275">**physical_lsw** Lower 32 bits (31-0) of the physical address to find, host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6276">**interface_index** この IPv6 アドレスに到達できるネットワーク デバイス インデックスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6276">**interface_index** Pointer to the network device index through which the IPv6 address can be reached</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6277">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) アドレスが正常に検出されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6278">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully found the address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) 近隣キャッシュに物理アドレスが見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6279">**NX_ENTRY_NOT_FOUND** (0x16) Physical address not found in the neighbor cache</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 機能が NetX Duo ライブラリに組み込まれていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6280">**NX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x4B) IPv6 feature is not built into the NetX Duo library</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) IP インスタンスまたはストレージ スペースが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6281">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid IP instance or storage space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6282">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC アドレスがゼロです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6283">**NX_INVALID_PARAMETERS** (0x4D) MAC address is zero.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6284">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6284">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6285">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6285">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6286">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6286">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6287">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6287">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6288">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6288">Example</span></span>

```c
/* This example inputs a hardware address to search on for the
   matching IPv6 global address in the neighbor cache table. */

NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
ULONG physical_msw = 0xcf;
ULONG physical_lsw = 0x01020304;
UINT  interface_index;

/* Obtain the IPv6 address mapped to the supplied hardware
   Address on the primary device. */
status = nxd_nd_cache_ip_address_find(&ip_0, &ip_address,
                                      physical_msw, physical_lsw,
                                      &interface_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, a matching entry was found in the
   neighbor cache table and the global IPv6 address returned in
   variable ip_address. */
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6305">nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6306">TCP 接続を確立します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6306">Make a TCP Connection</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6307">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6307">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(
    NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr
    NXD_ADDRESSS *server_ip,
    UINT server_port,
    ULONG wait_option);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6308">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6308">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6309">このサービスでは、以前に作成した TCP クライアント ソケットを使用して、指定されたサーバーのポートへの TCP 接続を確立します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6309">This service makes TCP connection using a previously created TCP client socket to the specified server's port.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6310">このサービスは、IPv4 と IPv6 のどちらのネットワーク上でも動作します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6310">This service works on either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6311">有効な TCP サーバー ポートの範囲は 0 から 0xFFFF です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6311">Valid TCP server ports range from 0 through 0xFFFF.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6312">NetX Duo では、このサーバーの IP アドレスに基づいて適切な物理インターフェイスを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6312">NetX Duo determines the appropriate physical interface based on the server IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6313">NetX IPv4 でこれに相当するのは、***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6313">The NetX IPv4 equivalent is ***nx_tcp_client_socket_connect***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6314">ソケットはローカル ポートにバインドされている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6314">The socket must have been bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6315">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6316">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6316">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created TCP socket</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6317">**server_ip** IPv4 または IPv6 宛先アドレスへのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6317">**server_ip** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 destination address, in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6318">**server_port** (1 から 0xFFFF) に接続するサーバー ポート番号 (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6318">**server_port** Server port number to connect to (1 through 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6319">**wait_option** 接続の確立中の待機オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6319">**wait_option** Wait option while the connection is being established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6320">この待機オプションは次のように定義されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6320">The wait options are defined as follows:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6321">**NX_NO_WAIT** (0x00000000)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6322">**NX_WAIT_FOREVER** (0xFFFFFFFF)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6323">**タイムアウト値 (ティック数)** (0x00000001 から 0xFFFFFFFE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6323">**timeout value in ticks** (0x00000001 through 0xFFFFFFFE)</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6324">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケットの接続に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6325">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful socket connect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) 要求された中断が tx_thread_wait_abort への呼び出しによって中止されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6326">**NX_WAIT_ABORTED** (0x1A) Requested suspension was aborted by a call to tx_thread_wait_abort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) サーバーの IPv4 アドレスまたは IPv6 アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6327">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) ソケットがバインドされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6328">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket is not bound</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) ソケットが CLOSED 状態ではありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6329">**NX_NOT_CLOSED** (0x35) Socket is not in a closed state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) 待機が指定されていないため、接続の試行を実行中です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6330">**NX_IN_PROGRESS** (0x37) No wait was specified, connection attempt is in progress</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) インターフェイスのインデックスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6331">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Invalid interface index.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) ネットワーク インターフェイスに有効な IPv6 アドレスがありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6332">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) The network interface does not have valid IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6333">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) ポートが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6334">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Invalid port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6335">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6336">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) 接続に失敗しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6337">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Connection fails.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6338">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6338">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6339">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6339">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6340">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6340">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6341">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6341">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6342">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6342">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS peer_ip_address;
ULONG       peer_port;

/* Set Peer IPv6 address */
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 0x101;

/* Set peer port number */
peer_port = 2563;

/* Connect to the peer */
status = nxd_tcp_client_socket_connect(socket_ptr,
                                       &peer_ip_address,
                                       peer_port, NX_WAIT_FOREVER);
```

## <a name="nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6366">nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6367">ピア TCP ソケットの IP アドレスとポート番号を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6367">Retrieves Peer TCP Socket IP Address and Port Number</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6368">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6368">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get
    (NX_TCP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *peer_ip_address,
    ULONG *peer_port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6369">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6370">このサービスでは、IPv4 または IPv6 ネットワーク経由で接続されている TCP ソケットのピア IP アドレスとポート情報を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6370">This service retrieves peer IP address and port information for the connected TCP socket over either IPv4 or IPv6 network.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6371">これに相当する NetX IPv4 サービスは、***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6371">The equivalent NetX IPv4 service is ***nx_tcp_socket_peer_info_get***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6372">*socket_ptr* では既に接続状態にある TCP ソケットをポイントする必要があることにご注意ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6372">Note that *socket_ptr* must point to a TCP socket that is already in the connected state.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6373">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6374">**socket_ptr** ピア ホストに接続されている TCP ソケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6374">**socket_ptr** Pointer to TCP socket connected to peer host</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6375">**peer_ip_address** IPv4 または IPv6 ピア アドレスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6375">**peer_ip_address** Pointer to IPv4 or IPv6 peer address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6376">返される IP アドレスは、ホストのバイト順になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6376">The returned IP address is in host byte order.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6377">**peer_port** ピア ポート番号へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6377">**peer_port** Pointer to peer port number.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6378">返されるポート番号は、ホストのバイト順になっています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6378">The returned port number is in host byte order.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6379">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6379">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソケット情報が正常に取得されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6380">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Socket information successfully retrieved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) ソケットがピアに接続されていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6381">**NX_NOT_CONNECTED** (0x38) Socket not connected to peer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6382">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) TCP not enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインター入力が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6383">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6384">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6385">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6385">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6386">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6386">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6387">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6387">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6388">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6388">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6389">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6389">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS  peer_ip_address;
ULONG        peer_port;

/* Get TCP socket information. */
status = nxd_tcp_socket_peer_info_get(socket_ptr, &peer_ip_address,
                                      &peer_port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the service returns valid peer info: */
if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V4)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v4 */

if(peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_version == NX_IP_VERSION_V6)
    /* Peer IP address is stored in
       peer_ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6 */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_packet_info_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6413">nxd_udp_packet_info_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6414">UDP パケットからネットワーク パラメーターを抽出します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6414">Extract network parameters from UDP packet</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6415">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6415">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT *protocol,
    UINT *port,
    UINT *interface_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6416">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6417">このサービスでは、IPv4 または IPv6 UDP ネットワーク上で受信したパケットからネットワーク パラメーターを抽出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6417">This service extracts network parameters from a packet received on either IPv4 or IPv6 UDP networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6418">NetX でこれに相当するサービスは、***nx_udp_packet_info_extract*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6418">The NetX equivalent service is ***nx_udp_packet_info_extract.***</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6419">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6420">**packet_ptr** パケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6420">**packet_ptr** Pointer to packet.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6421">**ip_address** 送信元 IP アドレスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6421">**ip_address** Pointer to sender IP address.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6422">**protocol** 返されるプロトコルへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6422">**protocol** Pointer to protocol to be returned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6423">**port** 送信元のポート番号へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6423">**port** Pointer to sender’s port number.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6424">**interface_index** パケットの取得元となるネットワーク インターフェイスのインデックスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6424">**interface_index** Pointer to the index of the network interface from which this packet is received</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6425">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6425">Return Values</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) パケット インターフェイス データが正常に抽出されました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6426">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Packet interface data successfully extracted.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) パケットが IPv4 でも IPv6 でもありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6427">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is neither IPv4 or IPv6.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ポインター入力が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6428">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6429">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6430">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6431">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6432">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6432">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6433">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6433">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6434">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6434">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Extract network data from UDP packet interface.*/
status = nxd_udp_packet_info_extract(packet_ptr, &ip_address,
                                    &protocol, &port,
                                    &interface_index);

/* If status is NX_SUCCESS packet data was successfully retrieved.*/
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6446">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6446">nx_udp_socket_info_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6447">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6447">nx_udp_socket_port_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6448">nx_udp_socket_receive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6448">nx_udp_socket_receive</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6449">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6449">nx_udp_socket_receive_notify</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6450">nx_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6450">nx_udp_socket_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6451">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6451">nx_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6452">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6452">nx_udp_socket_unbind</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6455">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6455">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6457">nxd_udp_socket_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6458">UDP データグラムを送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6458">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6459">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6459">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6460">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6461">このサービスでは、以前に作成され、バインドされた IPv4 または IPv6 ネットワーク用の UDP ソケットを介して UDP データグラムを送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6461">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6462">NetX Duo では、宛先 IP アドレスに基づいて、適切なローカル IP アドレスを発信元アドレスとして検索します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6462">NetX Duo finds a suitable local IP address as source address based on the destination IP address.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6463">特定のインターフェイスと発信元 IP アドレスを指定するには、アプリケーションで ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** サービスを使用する必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6463">To specify a specific interface and source IP address, the application should use the ***nxd_udp_socket_source_send*** service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6464">このサービスは、UDP データグラムが正常に送信されたかどうかに関係なく、直ちに返されることにご注意ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6464">Note that this service returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6465">NetX (IPv4) でこれに相当するサービスは、***nx_udp_socket_send*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6465">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_send***.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6466">このソケットは、ローカル ポートにバインドされている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6466">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6467">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6468">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された UDP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6468">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP データグラム パケットのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6469">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6470">**ip_address** 宛先の IPv4 または IPv6 アドレスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6470">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6471">**port** 1 から 0xFFFF の範囲の有効な宛先ポート番号 (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6471">**port** Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6472">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6472">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) UDP ソケットの送信に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6473">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6487">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6487">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the
   IPv6 address just created on the primary device (index 0). We
   don’t need the index into the address table, so the last argument
   is set to null. */

interface_index = 0;
status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, interface_index,
                              &ip_address, 64, NX_NULL);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                             &server_address, 12);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted
   the packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

## <a name="nxd_udp_socket_source_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6510">nxd_udp_socket_source_send</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6511">UDP データグラムを送信します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6511">Send a UDP Datagram</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6512">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6512">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_socket_source_send(
    NX_UDP_SOCKET *socket_ptr,
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address,
    UINT port, 
    UINT address_index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6513">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6514">このサービスでは、以前に作成され、バインドされた IPv4 または IPv6 ネットワーク用の UDP ソケットを介して UDP データグラムを送信します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6514">This service sends a UDP datagram through a previously created and bound UDP socket for either IPv4 or IPv6 networks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6515">パラメーター *address_index* に、発信パケットに使用する発信元 IP アドレスを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6515">The parameter *address_index* specifies the source IP address to use for the outgoing packet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6516">この関数は、UDP データグラムが正常に送信されたかどうかに関係なく、直ちに返されることにご注意ください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6516">Note that the function returns immediately regardless of whether the UDP datagram was successfully sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6517">このソケットは、ローカル ポートにバインドされている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6517">The socket must be bound to a local port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6518">NetX (IPv4) でこれに相当するサービスは、***nx_udp_socket_source_send*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6518">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent service is ***nx_udp_socket_source_send***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6519">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6519">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6520">**socket_ptr** 以前に作成された UDP ソケット インスタンスへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6520">**socket_ptr** Pointer to previously created UDP socket instance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP データグラム パケットのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6521">**packet_ptr** UDP datagram packet pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6522">**ip_address** 宛先 IPv4 または IPv6 アドレス ポート (有効な宛先ポート番号の範囲は 1 から 0xFFFF) へのポインター (ホストのバイト順)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6522">**ip_address** Pointer to destination IPv4 or IPv6 address port Valid destination port number between 1 and 0xFFFF), in host byte order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6523">**address_index** パケットに使用する発信元アドレスを指定するインデックス。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6523">**address_index** Index specifying the source address to use for the packet</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6524">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6524">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) UDP ソケットの送信に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6525">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful UDP socket send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) サーバーの IPv4 アドレスまたは IPv6 アドレスが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6526">**NX_IP_ADDRESS_ERROR** (0x21) Invalid server IPv4 or IPv6 address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) ソケットがどのポートにもバインドされていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6527">**NX_NOT_BOUND** (0x24) Socket not bound to any port</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) 適切な送信インターフェイスが見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6528">**NX_NO_INTERFACE_ADDRESS** (0x50) No suitable outgoing interface can be found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) 適切なインターフェイスが見つかりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6529">**NX_NOT_FOUND** (0x4E) No suitable interface can be found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケットのポインター、アドレス、またはパケットのポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6530">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer, address, or packet pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6531">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP が有効になっていません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6532">**NX_NOT_ENABLED** (0x14) UDP has not been enabled</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) ポート番号が有効な範囲内にありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6533">**NX_INVALID_PORT** (0x46) Port number is not within valid range.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) 指定されたネットワーク インターフェイスが有効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6534">**NX_INVALID_INTERFACE** (0x4C) Specified network interface is valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) パケットに UDP ヘッダーのための十分な空き領域がありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6535">**NX_UNDERFLOW** (0x02) Not enough room for UDP header in the packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) パケットの追加ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6536">**NX_OVERFLOW** (0x03) Packet append pointer is invalid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6541">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6541">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address, server_address;
UINT address_index;

/* Set the UDP Client IPv6 address. */
ip_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
ip_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 1;

/* Set the UDP server IPv6 address to send to. */
server_address.nxd_ip_version = NX_IP_VERSION_V6;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[0] = 0x20010000;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[1] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[2] = 0;
server_address.nxd_ip_address.v6[3] = 2;

/* Set the global address (indicated by the 64 bit prefix) using the IPv6
   address just created on the primary device (index 0). The address index
   is needed for nxd_udp_socket_source_send. */

status = nxd_ipv6_address_set(&client_ip, 0,
                              &ip_address, 64, &address_index);

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket with the ip_address and
   allocate a packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Send a packet to the UDP server at server_address on port 12. */
status = nxd_udp_socket_source_send(&client_socket, packet_ptr,
                                    &server_address, 12, address_index);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the UDP host successfully transmitted the
   packet out the UDP socket to the server. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6563">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6563">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>

## <a name="nxd_udp_source_extract"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6564">nxd_udp_source_extract</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6565">UDP パケットの発信元情報を取得します</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6565">Retrieve UPD Packet Source Information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6566">プロトタイプ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6566">Prototype</span></span>  

```c
UINT nxd_udp_source_extract(
    NX_PACKET *packet_ptr,
    NXD_ADDRESS *ip_address, 
    UINT *port);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6567">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6567">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6568">このサービスでは、ホストの UDP ソケット経由で受信した UDP パケットから、発信元 IP アドレスとポート番号を抽出します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6568">This service extracts the source IP address and port number from a UDP packet received through the host UDP socket.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6569">NetX (IPv4) でこれに相当するのは、***nx_udp_source_extract*** です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6569">The NetX (IPv4) equivalent is ***nx_udp_source_extract***.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6570">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6570">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6571">**packet_ptr** 受信した UDP パケットへのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6571">**packet_ptr** Pointer to received UDP packet</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6572">**ip_address** パケットの発信元 IP アドレスを格納する NXD_ADDRESS 構造体へのポインター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6572">**ip_address** Pointer to NXD_ADDRESS structure to store packet source IP address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6573">**port** UDP ソケットのポート番号へのポインター。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6573">**port** Pointer to UDP socket port number</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6574">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6574">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ソースの抽出に成功しました。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6575">**NX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful source extract</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) パケットが正しくありません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6576">**NX_INVALID_PACKET** (0x12) Packet is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) ソケット ポインターが無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6577">**NX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid socket pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a7950-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) このサービスの呼び出し元が無効です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6578">**NX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this service</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6579">許可元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6579">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6580">Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6580">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="preemption-possible"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6581">プリエンプション可能</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6581">Preemption Possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a7950-6582">いいえ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6582">No</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7950-6583">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7950-6583">Example</span></span>

```c
NXD_ADDRESS ip_address;
UINT         port;

/* Create the UDP socket client_socket and
   allocate the packet pointed to by packet_ptr (not shown). */

/* Extract the IP address and port of the packet received on the UDP
   socket specified in the packet interface. */
status = nxd_udp_source_extract(&packet_ptr, &ip_address, &port);

/* If status == NX_SUCCESS, the source IP address and port of the
   packet received on the UDP socket was successfully extracted. */
```
